reviews.review_title: If you loved Stella by Stella McCartneyu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore Stella by Stella McCartney for fifteen years. It was my signature scent. Everyone knew me by it. After it got discontinued I was heartbroken. Devastated. Destroyed. Yet, behold- Roses de Chlou00e9 came into my life. This is my new signature scent! I finally found a nice rose with amber that can replace my love Stella.  This scent is fresh and not overwhelming. It definitely has Stella vibes. I LOVE it.  If you love rose scents you will adore this. I also bought the rose tangerine Chlou00e9. That one will be for summer. However, it smells wonderful as well. Please donu2019t discontinue this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin

If you like rose I do think you will love this! Also of course itu2019s high end quality so aside from the scent itu2019s great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent, not too sweet but also strong enough to smell great throughout the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like the smell of roses, this perfume definitely lives up to that scent. When I received this sample I was excited because who doesnu2019t like perfumes! But, when I opened it I was hesitant that I was not going to like it because Iu2019m not a huge floral scent person. But to my surprise I was able to handle this perfume because it was not overpowering. When you first put on the perfume (I had a roll on) it smells like fresh cut roses, but shortly after it turned into a sweeter, light rose scent. As the time went on the fresh cut smell of roses died down and I was able to enjoy the perfume. I had other people around me compliment the scent, which I found interesting because not a lot of people are fans of floral perfumes. I also found that the scent lasted for most of the day, but again, I had a roll on version so Iu2019m not sure if the spray bottle would last longer or shorter than the roll on? The free, small sample I received lasted me quite a while. I used it everyday (around my wrists and behind the ears) from the day I got it up until now, which was about 1.5-2 months. I do think getting a small sample size would be better for someone wanting to try it out to see if they like it because again, floral, rose scents are not for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great quality perfume. The scent remains strong even after hours. Unfortunately, the fragrance itself just wasnu2019t for me. If you for sure like roses or can smell it in advance and enjoy it, then I definitely recommend. I canu2019t give it a bad rating because of personal preference because it was a strong scent that lasted and thatu2019s exactly what you want from a perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the smell of this scent. The scent lasted me all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this perfume because it was a gentle rose scent that wasnu2019t overwhelming. Itu2019s a great spring perfume. The packaging was nice and simple. Wearing this perfume made me feel clean and fresh. Iu2019m not typically one for floral scents because they can be cloying but this one won me over. The only problem is that since itu2019s EDT it does not last long. It only last an hour but the roller ball makes reapplication easy, which is a plus. Its easy to wear everyday and Itu2019s definitely a day time perfume and it works really well with layering! I would purchase this as a gift despite it not lasting long on me because it is a really nice rose based perfume that is not over complicated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a rollerball version of Roses de Chloe from influenster. I tried it couple of times for day and evening events before writing this review. This perfume is not too overpowering, it smells like roses (just as its name). In my opinion it is good for office and other casual events, I would not wear it for a date night :) If you love floral fragrances you might love this perfume. Honestly I am not a huge fan of floral smell thatu2019s why I gave 3 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scents, smells like walking down a path full of roses, very feminine, will definitely purchase the big size next time, and the bottle shape is very aesthetic, when wearing this people ask me about what I am wearing cause it smells so nice

I have and love the original Chloe, so I was very excited to try this. Unfortunately, something in this perfume gave me a headache every time I tried it. The profile was nice, but it's not for me.  I received these products for free from Influenster and brand(s) in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this perfume because the original Chloe happens to be my favorite scent of all time. Roses de Chloe does not quite live up to the original, in my opinion. I like the scent of roses, but you must love the scent of roses to love this perfume; the rose note is almost overwhelming to me - so much so that I I have a difficult time detecting the notes that are at the heart of what I love about Chloe. After a couple of hours, it settles to a lovely, soft fragrance that I truly enjoy, but those opening notes are strong! This perfume is better suited to spring and summer, so perhaps I will like it more if I try it again when it warms up. If you adore roses, this is the scent for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I give this a 3.5 star but rounding up to a 4. Itu2019s a true rose scent thatu2019s light and delicate. Itu2019s a bit more refreshing than your typical grandma rose scent but stays true to the name. I knocked off a star since the scent faded quicker than I had hoped and it began to smell powdery to me. I received this product free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Roses de chloe is a beautiful subtle rose scent. It is not obnoxiously floral. The scent is long lasting. I love how soft the scent is. Rose fragrances usually tend to be nauseating but not this one.

reviews.review_text: I received the roller ball of this product in exchange for an honest review. Honestly, I really like the scent. It definitely smells like roses but is nice and light. At first I was disappointed in how long it lasted but then I tried using a little more and you could smell it all day. I think itu2019s great for every day wear. Or as a signature scent if thatu2019s what youu2019re going for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I tried out the perfume for a couple days and all I can say it is worth it because it smells amazing and it last me all throughout a full long concert. Will definitely be buying a full size perfume .

It does not overwhelm, but provides a soft, subtle fragrance.

I asked him if he cared that I wear this more often and he said definitely. Iu2019m not gonna lie, Iu2019ll be purchasing this fragrance again in the future, after I finish the travel size. The scent has some lasting power, though it is an Eau de toilette so it won't last all day, but with this convenient rollerball travel format I've been able to reapply as much as I want! Even on hot active days I've only needed to the once though. It's also a great quality rollerball, well made, I have used some not-so-great ones and this one has been consistent since I bought it in 2016. I am pleasantly surprised that the smell has remained the same until now in 2020, so the slow exposure to air as I've used it (it's still a third full) hasn't affected it any. Excellent product, would recommend, and will buy again!

I can only smell it after 5-6 hours if I put my nose right up to my wrist. A very office-friendly fragrance.
Really light and lovely scent. Wish it lasted a bit longer though

reviews.review_title: It's OK, Not Quite What I Was Hoping For
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a perfume to replace Stella McCartney's Rose Absolute for years now.  I LOVED that perfume.  It had a lovely, dark, velvety rose smell, and it lasted all day.  This is...close.  I get the rose, but there's an undertone of something lighter that reminds me of Marc Jacobs Daisy (which I don't care for).  I guess that's the bergamot?  And the staying power isn't great.  I applied it less than an hour ago and it's already mostly faded.  The rose is almost all gone, but the undertones are still there.  I'll use this, but keep looking for my perfect rose perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a former rose perfume hater who absolutely loves this one. But it has almost zero staying power! It fades within an hour to such a low a level that I have to put my nose right to my wrist to smell it. I had to buy a rollerball to take with me for touch-ups. And I have a very sensitive nose---I hardly put on any when wearing most fragrances. What is it that makes a scent fade so quickly? I know I'm not the only one who's experienced this with Roses de Chlou00e9. That's why I only gave it 4 stars. They need to make it in a stronger concentration.

This is my go to and am incredibly happy I found this, as compared to all of the other rose focused floral scents, this is a perfect combination of authentic rose smell and perfume rose smell.   It's elegant, sophisticated, and refined.  Victor and Rolf Flower Bomb was what I wore before for 10 years, but now I've outgrown that scent and has become a bit too sweet for my taste.

reviews.review_text: i've been searching for the better part of 2 years for an accurate rose-scented perfume, one that was sweet enough to tell it was supposed to be a rose and soft enough that it wasn't too overpowering. THIS IS IT. i've been trying everything, even Bath and Body Works new rose line. that line has NOTHING on Roses De Chlou00e9. it's the most floral rosey scent i've ever encountered and i will forever be buying this scent. i've been getting compliments every day since i started wearing it. love love LOVE IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free small sample of the new Chloe by Lu2019EAU this past week compliments of Influenster to try for my honest review.  I am giving this perfume a 5 star rating for its fragrance only.  I typically give my wrist a small spritz as well my neck.  Iu2019m very picky about my choices when it comes to perfume, something that is not musky or way too flowery and this fits the flattery perfect.  As it reads on the card that accompanied the sample u201ca rare simplicity and eternal grace, A light natural Dew Drop Trail where notes of Rose absolute blend with a voluptuous Magnola accordu201d.  The downside to the fragrance is that is it very strong, a bit overwhelmingly strong.  It would have been better placed somewhere closer to my feet than my throat because after 4 hours as I type this I can still taste the blend as if I just spritz it.  I am to be convinced that everyone in my building knows I am currently here today. If that is something you do not mind then by all means u2026u2026 spritz away but if it is not then use very sparingly because a little goes a very long way.  I will try Chloe again on another day just by giving a little spritz on the wrist but nothing more.  If I am not overwhelmed by the application on that day I would not be opposed to purchase this myself for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before I even knew about this perfume I remember multiple occasions where I was out and about and was hit with the most amazing smelling perfume I had ever smelled. I mean it, this perfume was like a drug to me! I couldn't get enough!  After MUCH searching I was able to find it and have worn it everyday since. This is the ultimate girly scent without being overpowering. I find it is the perfect scent for someone looking for a feminine scent that doesn't smell too mature or young. On my body I find the light flowery hints wear over the day until they are mixed beautifully with a almost vanilla spice-like undertone.   The absolute only complaint I have (which contributes to the 4/5 rather than 5/5 rating) is that I find it wears much more on warmer days where I'm sweating more. Around mid afternoon I am ready to reapply. That being said I have less of an issue during the Fall/Winter months.   After almost 2 years, I still find myself sitting at my desk sniffing at my wrist every so often because I just can't get enough of this scent! So happy to have found my perfect signature fragrance.

reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this with another fragrance order (Pacific Lime by Atelier) and absolutely fell in love with it.  My mom tried it as well and was immediately sold.  I bought a rollerball for each of us so now we can playfully compliment each other on our perfume.  What is that fabulous scent you're wearing?  Roses de Chloe?  Me too! I do declare! I'm not normally a fan of floral fragrances but this is different somehow.  It's a very light, fresh rose scent.  More like picking up a hint of rose in the breeze rather than face-planting in a bouquet of sugar-coated roses.  Mom and I both highly recommend.

I have been using a rose scented conditioner by Love, Beauty, and Planet and really wanted a rose scented perfume. This perfume smells like crushed up rose petals. It has a classic perfume smell and even the bottle looks vintage. If you are looking for a perfume with serious floral overtones, THIS IS IT!

reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful and floral scent that isnu2019t too strong. It really does smell like roses, and not that awful fake rose smell a lot of things have. Iu2019ve used a spritz in the morning and one later in the day, I donu2019t see that as a bad thing - better than a stinky cloud that overpowers you from one tiny drop (tried the Nirvana Black fragrance and it was the most horrible thing Iu2019ve ever smelled and way too strong - yikes!!!). You can still smell it after you use it and it doesnu2019t immediately fade though itu2019s nice to add some back on after a few hours.  I donu2019t know any fragrance that totally lasts all day so Iu2019m not sure about the complaints on that point. This is a really lovely floral that has a more natural feel to it.

The scent is definitely of roses so if you're looking for a true soft rose scent you've found it. It's also quite soft but still noticeable and has the most amazing staying power. I apply this in the morning and can still smell it at the end of the night without needing a touch up in between. I haven't found a single fragrance yet with that type of staying power. I also want to mention that I don't care what a bottle looks like, I only care about the scent itself but if you do care than this bottle is quite lovely and oh so feminine like the scent itself. It really it pretty sitting on my dresser. I also own the travel size, rollerball, it will come in handy when I don't want to risk my beautiful bottle for a weekend away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had to buy the full size after buying the rollerball. Florals aren't usually my style, I normally wear spicy oriental's but I have been searching for that perfect pure rose scent. I found it! I had my husband sniff me after having this on for maybe 30 minutes and he loved it. He said he preferred it over my signature scent which he happened to love so that's saying something. Years ago I had bought Joy perfume, the pure very expensive perfume that's nothing but pure roses and while it had a beautiful scent I ended up returning it because I couldn't smell it on myself after maybe 1 hour at the most, and the price was over $200 25 yrs ago. I wish this was at least a parfume but it does have much more staying power than I would have expected, I could still smell it quite a few hours (maybe 8 or so?) after applying. All in all I'm very pleased with my purchase and will now own the rollerball for my purse and the bottle for home. If you're looking for a true rose scent I couldn't recommend this enough!

It trails behind me and sticks to all of my scarves and jackets. I would have to disagree. Try putting on an oily non-scented body cream for the scent to cling to. By providing a base , it will stick better. Try it if you havenu2019t already!

reviews.review_text: Very pretty rose scent, not super grandma smelling. It's small and convenient to have in your bag or for travel. Absolutely love it!

Exactly the scent I've been searching for. . . But far too faint. It stays very close to the skin. After a few minutes, I can only smell it with my nose right on my arm. After two hours it's completely gone. People around me only notice it if they get really close and try to find the scent. Applying over moisturizer seems to help the scent stick. Layering over longer lasting scents may also help. When I was trying it on in the store I think I crossed it with Nirvana White by accident. The resulting scent was much stronger and is probably why I bought this one.

Just perfect for me ! If you love Rose fragrance , then this one is for you. I can't get over this one.

I love the smell its subtle and doesn't overwhelm

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's an absolutely lovely fragrance and I love it but I have to convince myself to use it sparingly because if the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the rollerball and the full size bottle, I absolutely love love love this scent! It's a romantic, soft, powdery, clean and feminine perfume that you can wear for every occasion! It wears well and stays fresh if I sweat a bit. I get compliments on it every time I wear it!

Bought Roses soon after it debuted and it's the first fragrance I've loved enough to finish the entire bottle. Typically, I lose interest in fragrances and forget to apply them, and will often buy rollerballs for this reason (which I've a tendency to misplace). This one receives regular useu2014almost daily, unless I happen upon a sample that catches my attention momentarily. I love the scent of roses and this fragrance captures it beautifully and elegantly; it's subtle and fresh, not overpowering in the way so many florals can be. I only wish it had better staying power or came in an eau de parfum formula.
I'm using this one since last year and I'm still in love with this. Even I can smell on street in the air if someone is wearing this!
Smells like sweet rose, but not too overpowering. It stays quite long and I absolutely love this fragrance, I am definitely going to buy this again.
Not a huge fan of floral scents but love this one. Lasts pretty long too.
I have never gotten as many compliments on my perfume as I have when I wear this! From both men and women! It's light and romantic and it doesn't over power you. Love it- it's my go to!

As a lover of the smell of roses, I had been looking for something exactly like this perfume for years! It smells beautiful and lasts long enough, for me personally. But I always have my rollerball with me to freshen up through the day! That's just how much I love this scent!

This is my new favorite perfume! It is the PERFECT rose scent, and I've tried plenty! It's a very fresh rose bouquet smell, with a hint of bright bergot, and a slightly sweet but complex honey base(I'm sure that's actually the amber)  It's a seriously gorgeous scent, I can't wait to purchase the full size bottle!
Pros: Beautiful floral fragrance, long-lasting, fresh but not cloying Cons: Smells faintly of alcohol (But what perfume doesn't?)

I've been using Roses De Chlou00e9 for over 3 years now, and I have never loved a perfume more! It's my perfect scent! It's smells like sweet rose, honey, and maybe a tiny bit of vanilla. It's youthful but mature at the same time, not juvenile or old, and smells sophisticated. It's perfect for someone who doesn't want to smell like their grandma or how they did in middle school. It's the perfect about sweet & soft floral!

This was love at first sniff for me. I love the scent of antique roses as it reminds me of my Oma. The notes are very sensual but not overly sexy. Definitely a scent that flatters a wide age range but doesn't give off an old lady vibe. The only glaring issue is that the scent doesn't seem to last very long before I need to touch up but that could be a problem specific to me.

reviews.review_title: Best perfume I have ever used in my life
reviews.review_text: Subtle yet gorgeous essence of rose - the smell of rose is obviously the strongest layer of scent. I have tried many perfumes across my lifetime and have only recently found this fragrance; it is subtle yet its statement is definitive. Perfect perfume, hope to continue to wear it for years to come.

Let it be known that my love affair with roses de chlou00e9 wasn't a love at first sniff. I didn't really pay attention to this variant because I was really into the original chlou00e9 and the love story. Until recently spring time finally came and i was looking for a new fragrance that will remind me of the fresh spring scent every time I use it. I sprayed the roses de chlou00e9 on the paper strip and oh boy it smelled like a plain rose water. It didn't excite me so I totally forgot about it. The next time I went to Sephora I sprayed it on my wrist. I dunno why I but it was totally different on the skin vs. the paper strip. On my skin it smelled like the most beautiful enchanting and freshest rose scent ever! It smelled so delicate and so feminine. The scent will transport you to a garden of roses in a clear crisp spring morning while touching the morning dew. It just blew me away. I didn't buy it right away because i wanted to test the silage and how it smells after a few hours. This scent didn't last the whole day fyi because the scent is really soft and mild. However I cannot forget this perfume that I went ahead and bought it anyway. Plus, most long lasting perfumes are those that are musky and strong, and the head ache trigger scents which I avoid especially in the spring and summer months. So I don't really mind if it doesn't last on me the whole day because I get to do a couple more spritz every time. I got the spray bottle and rollerball for touch ups during the day. And I am so happy I did. This perfume is the best perfume in my collection so far due to the fact that it puts me in a happy mood every time I use it. That's when you know you found your all time signature scent!!! Please don't ever discontinue this Chlou00e9!
Would recommend. For rose lovers.
Fresh, femme, and bubbly. This one actually smells a lot like lychee on me. My only negative is that it doesn't last as long as I'd like.

I love, Love, LOVE this scent!  I received a sample vial a couple years ago and have not worn anything else since.  The rose is fresh and clean, not powdery or old ladylike.  The initial rose notes do fade over a couple of hours but what is left after those hours is a truly beautiful clean floral smell that lasts all day and all night.

reviews.review_title: A Rose Perfume for the Rose-Adverse
reviews.review_text: I'm not into Rose-scents.  At least I wasn't until I smelled this one.  So light, fresh, and intoxicating!  I'm so addicted to this scent!  I have found longevity to be about 4 hours on me.  It is an eau de toilette, I suppose.  But my Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet seems to last longer.  (Maybe I just can't smell roses de chloe?)  It's heavenly while I smell it on myself though!!

Like many other reviewers have said this scent does not last long because it's not a parfum, but an eau de toilette. That being said, I have a large bottle to put on in the morning, a tiny bottle that was limited edition for awhile in my desk at work, and a roller ball in my purse for quick reapplication. I searched for a signature scent for YEARS and I just fell in love with this one. I wish they would make a parfum but I still love it. I get compliments all the time, it really sinks into your skin and smells beautiful and natural without smelling like you're wearing heavy perfume!
got this in the sample grab bag.... LOOOOOVE it!
Basically that sums it up. Hey Chloe make a parfum of this fragrance

A soft, flowery scent that's not inundated by heavy traces of musk, spice, or citrus. It is not candying, powdery, or acidic, and has a light whiff of roses. Definitely would recommend the Eau de Parfum as the Eau de Toilette requires a few good spritzes for the scent to last, but I love it nonetheless and would buy again.

I love how this product captures the fresh rose scent. I bought it instantly after trying it out in the store. But the scent doesn't last long. With in minutes, the captivating fresh rose scent disappears and leaving behind a very generic scent that is common to all Chloe perfumes.

reviews.review_title: Smell is fab but fades fast
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume! It's an updated, sophisticated, feminine fresh rose smell. The bad part is that the smell fades very fast. It's just not worth the price because it goes away within an hour. Please re-formulate so that it stays at least 4 hours! The scent is fabulous and I want to buy it again.
I work at retail and everytime I have this on at least 1 customer always asks me what perfume I have on. It smells like fresh roses. And lasts all day.

I don't usually write reviews.  I got a sample of this when I bought an Artelier perfume and a Yves St. Laurent one.  This immediately got used and my new ones got put on a shelf.  Next day I bought it.  I love the smell of roses, a GOOD one.  Not an over powering grandmothery scent.  This was perfect.   It's got the hint of an underlying Chlou00e9 original but just barely so it isn't completely like you bathed in rose perfume, but I love it.  Surpassed my Tory Burch favorite, Love Relentlessly, and I am anxiously awaiting my new order..... so glad I got the perfume sample bag with this in it!!!!
This is my favorite perfume. The smell is not harsh but a light inviting rose. Absolutely perfect. Strangers always compliment me when I wear this and tell me it smells wonderful!
THIS IS MY FAVORITE FRAGRANCE EVER. I'm so in love ever since I received my first sample of it. By far my all time fav.

reviews.review_title: Love the scent but does not last
reviews.review_text: I love the scent and just got my third bottle It's a mild rose scent and its not my musky at all which is what i love, it does not last long and I have to spray is all over for me to smell it on myself

I received this from my husband for Christmas. He had my daughter help pick it out. In the store they both lived the rose hinted scent.  I was hesitant due to the rose part, I kept thinking I'm going to smell like my Grandmother. Turning 47 this year, I do not need the fragrance to age me also! I opened it hopeful it was as nice of smell as they said it was.  On smell I will say I did like it. It's fresher than granny's scent of old. It goes on with a fresh roses scent. Smells pretty good...but, after 1 hour..there is absolutely no smell on me.  I honestly have bought $5 knockoff perfume that last longer than this.  Seriously, no smell left on coat, clothes or self. Maybe it's my chemistry but nothing. So for $70, even though it was sentimental because my husband and daughter smelled quite a few fragrances before picking this one first for my Christmas present, I must return it..hoping they take the opened bottle with package and receipt back.  And I can purchase my own Christmas present :(
great floral scentuff0c not overwhelming the rose smelluff0c very feminine.
Very floral, very Chic, Really Good Fragrance, love it, Love it.

I recently received Roses de Chloe as a sample. I have to say this is not my cup of tea. This fragrance is described as delicate and graceful scent. It definitely reminds me of a Classic Floral that my grandmother would use. Itu2019s a shame that I didnu2019t like it because it does exude a light and fresh note to it. Although this is just a sample size I noticed the packaging for the full size bottle and it is adorable and dainty. I donu2019t see myself making this purchase.
Bought this rollerball on a whim, and am surprised how much I love it- may be my new scent! Very clean, with a touch of rose. And even better it lasts longer than most perfumes I've tried.

reviews.review_title: Smell good but does not last
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to purchase a new fragrance for myself for Christmas. I tried this on in the store and really liked it & purchase it. However, it really does not last long on. I put enough on in the mornings and it still does last.. I liked it but probably wouldn't purchase it again.

My boyfriend bought me this perfume after months of me lusting after it. I have always adored a luxurious, floral, rose scent and was so excited to have finally found the perfect one. It isn't too sweet and it isn't too bright like other floral perfumes.  My main issues with this perfume is that the bottle started tarnishing/rusting after a few months! And I store all my perfumes carefully and none of them have ever done that so it's disappointing to have that happen on an expensive product! Also it is NOT LONG LASTING! Had to buy the rollerball to make sure I had a scent on me all day, it fades after a few hours!
I have the original Chloe but this one is my favourite now

I love this fragrance so much! In the past I have worn Coco Mademoiselle and Versace Bright Crystal (both the original and Absule). I was looking for something that was classic and fresh. I was originally considering Miss Dior when I ran into this at the store and I just had to try it. Thankfully I did because I'm completely obsessed! It is a classic rose scent that sands out from the complimentray hints of Bergamot and white musk. My roommate even told me that she loves how it smells when I spray it and that you can still smell it lightly on me later in the day. If you love fresh floral fragrances give this a go!
I wanted to like this perfume but it reacts really badly with my chemistry and I end up smelling like old sock :/ Smells great on my mom though.

This scent smells great, but after 30-45 minutes of wearing, you can't smell it anymore. You would have to keep reapplying it and thats not worth the money you're spending. If you don't buy perfume often, take the time and get something that lasts.

Well, I've got myself 2 bottles of Chloe EDT. It's very flowery and gives out a very strong, rosy scent. I can't smell diverse layers and rose is the only thing that's detectable. BF said it was too fierce and strong, and not feminine enough.  But personally I love it!
I have been looking for a decent Rose scented perfume. I love this. It's not too strong and smells slightly more than just roses.

I love this scent. This is classic roses, but just a touch sweeter,  which fades and blends perfectly after a day of wear. The only reason I gave this four stars instead of five is because I'm not always certain that the perfume is exiting the rollerball - perhaps that's only a quirk on my particular product? I plan on buying this again when my roller ball runs out.
The smell is sweet and lasts all day. Love it!

If I had to choose one word to describe this perfume, it would be: romantic! It's a soft floral balanced with a stand up citrus. Romantic, whimsical, peppy. One of the few fragrances I don't mind owning a full sized bottle of! Love it.

reviews.review_title: I take it everywhere I go
reviews.review_text: My everyday perfume is Burberry Brit Sheer, and I decided I wanted something similar but more floral/rosey. This scent is light floral and feminine, but potent enough to last. I get headaches from overpowering scents, so this was great for me. It's compact enough that I can throw is in my purse when I go out or to work, or when I travel.

I have been looking for a rose peefume for awhile. Many are typically too powdery smelling even my cousin had warned me about it smelling 'old'. It's a perfume you should go check it out in store and spray it on yourself. It smells different on everyone but I will personally be back to buy more! So happy I got the largest bottle!
If you want to smell like a bouquet of roses, this is for you! A very simple, straightforward scent. Like a little gift of fresh flowers.

Rose has not been my thing since the 70s when I wore the original Perfumer's Workshop Tea Rose before entering my 40 year Chanel obsession. However  I have found myself drawn to rose scents over the past year.   I got a deluxe sample of this and I have fallen in love with it over the past few months.  The rose smells like my grandma's garden after a rain and not like a funeral parlor as so many rose scents do to me.  The amber in the drydown makes this smell sophisticated and a little sexy.   I'd say this is closer to a skin scent after the first hour or so which is how I like my perfume. I am not a fan of fragrance announcing itself to the public or leaving a vapor trail so if you want monster sillage this is not for you.   The scent lasted a!! day on me.

I have trouble wearing most scents because I'm really sensitive to smells. This one smells really pretty but it doesn't last very long. I tried putting more on one day but it was way too much for me. It smells like roses which is what I wanted but I wish it lasted longer. I didn't get any compliments on it and could only smell it when I smelled where I had applied it.

I got a sample of this in an order and the rose smell is lovely--actually like roses, but not overpowering--but the scent lasts like three seconds (more accurately, maybe around an hour tops). I expected it to last longer. Pretty, and glad I can experience it, but certainly wouldn't buy it.
I love this perfume. It always manages to put a smile on my face whenever I put it on.

reviews.review_title: all the rose and none of the old lady powder
reviews.review_text: I love a rose fragrance but many are old lady powder (not for me) or develop into something else that completely ditches the rose notes.    Not this one - very fresh rose that develops into a sexier, warmer rose.   And best of all - it lasts through the day.   I highly recommend this fragrance.

reviews.review_title: a rose fragrance that actually smells like roses!
reviews.review_text: I have searched for ages for a rose perfume that TRULY smells like roses...they got this one right!  Perfect for summer!

Im obsessed with rose scent, and this has the perfect lightness of rose to it. I smell so fresh and sweet. Love it. Only gripe is the scent is not super long lasting,  so i keep the rollerball on me to reapply as needed

I received a sample of this perfume. Its like nothing I've smelled before. Sometimes, rose scents can be too strong but this one is not. It's delicate and sweet. And it lasts a long time but not empowering. I will be purchasing a bottle.

This smells soooo lovely and feminine. I've noticed that some rose perfumes can be nauseatingly heavy, but this is light and refreshing and gives a youthful vibe. I wear this to work. Chloe's perfumes are all high-quality; it has pretty good lasting power!

I'm usually not one to purchase perfumes, the only other one I own is MJ Decadence but I have to say, I like this one more! I don't normally gravitate towards florals but there's just something so enticing about this scent! Found my new go-to!

I don't like strong perfume but love floral scents, so it has taken me a long time to find a perfume that has both qualities. This perfume is exactly what I was looking for, it is very subtle and still is sexy. It is my perfect perfume and I will never buy anything else.

I typically don't like floral scents at all because I get headaches easily from perfumes. But this perfume is lighter and doesn't have that strong aroma that stays after days of not using your clothes. Its pretty pricey but I've never found a perfume I could withstand until this one. I'll forever stay faithful to it.

I normally am not a fan of floral powdery scents (I typically enjoy heavier scents such as Black Opium or Red). However, I fell in love with this perfume when I sprayed it in the store. I find it to be a light and refreshing scent that smells exactly like roses. I spray it on my wrists and my neck, and I find that it helps the scent last longer. I like to wear just this during the day, and then if I'm going out, I'll put on a darker perfume along with a spritz of this.
I tried out the sample size and about in 1 or 2 hrs is already gone, for the price of full size I consider it should last longer. :/

I got this as a sample and am in love. This perfume is so pretty smelling. I feel beautiful when I wear it. My only complaint is it doesn't last very long. I will be getting the full size bottle and roller ball to keep in my purse to reapply throughout the day.

This is my new favorite perfume for awhile. It does come out strong at first but settles as a lighter oohahhh smell through out the day. Overall smells really good, the original chloe in my opinion smells like old lady perfume, which is horrible.
So happy they came out with a rollerball for this! Very light and fresh rose scent, one of my favorites!
I love the smell .. I adore it.. But 2 things; it's not long wearing and really cheap packaging. Bottle rusted within days after use. So pricey  for cheap bottle.

I was really hoping to love this stuff. I got a sample with a Sephora package so I bought the perfume in a bottle as well as roller ball to take with me in my purse. I LIVE the scent, but it disappears almost instantly. I am known for two things: my eyelashes (Benefit, They're Real!) and always smelling great. With this stuff I just didn't smell it after 20 minutes, and when I asked my coworker's if they could smell it, they all said very faintly. Not worth the money, in my opinion.

I tend to steer clear of many floral scents as after awhile they start to remind me of my mom and other older women in my family who wear a potent amount of perfume, enough to steal your breath away and be a choking hazard within a certain proximity of these ladies (those perfumes had a particular... 'old' kind of powdery grandma scent to them). That said, this scent does not bring to mind any of those hilarious (yet torturous) memories. Instead, it reminds me of the first time my SO brought me home roses, and romantic memories of the like.  What I loved most about this product, was while I LOVED it straight out of the bottle and on a piece of paper just to smell. On my skin it was a whole new experience. The scent intensified! It was bolder, yet still subtle/light enough that it wasn't overwhelming to be near me even when I sprayed myself more than what I would normally wear. The best part, it lasted a good 8 hours at least! (heck, I even smelled some on me the following morning when I woke up).  It is pricey, I'll admit I choked on whatever beverage I was drinking when I saw the price. However, for how long it lasts and the beautiful scent it has on my skin, I am willing to spurge a little for a good quality perfume. I don't have many perfumes anyways, and this is my first floral scent, too! I'm very pleased!
It's smells incredible! It's smells romantic and fits perfectly. Definitely repurchasing in a larger size.
Not an overpowering scent. Don't have to use much. Scent stays. Love the hint of rose with it. I may like it better than the plain Chloe.

reviews.review_title: a gentler more feminine rose with bright note
reviews.review_text: It dries down to a sexy feminine musk with Rose and a light powder note. Cartier Rose de Goutte is my favorite more bold rose scent...coming from a woman who prefers oriental woodsy scents most, this floral find is a treat I wear when I feel a little more innocent and light-hearted.
This is such a classy but sexy smell. I love it so much!! Definitely buying again!!!
This smells exactly like a full fresh bouquet of red roses, so natural and beautiful, no powdery old scent at all. I can't believe I didn't discover this one sooner! I'm a fan for life.

I got a sample of this with my last order and I'm in love. It's light and fresh and floral and delicate, and it actually does have strong rose notes. Like a subtler version of the original Chloe fragrance, if you're familiar with that. Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the scent doesn't really last, maybe because it's so light. I'd make this my new go-to if it weren't so darn expensive!!

I LOVE THIS PERFUME. The original Chloe has been my favorite for a while and this still smells a bit like it, but with a fresh new twist. I'm obsessed! I'm so happy I got it as a free sample! I bought the rollerball right away and got the purse size bottle.

I adore roses and this fragrance is like fresh roses in a bottle.  Beautiful and not artificial-smelling.  Very subtle on the skin but does have staying power...warms up for a gorgeous, feminine scent.

This is my favorite perfume I've tried in YEARS. It is feminine, fresh, and elegant. It's not what I would typically associate with that powdery, grandma-esque rose perfume. It's fresher and lighter, and smells like an actual bouquet of roses rather than an artificial scent. The bottle is also very chic and looks gorgeous on my vanity.
I love the smell of this. I received it as a sample and it smells like im a walking bouquet of roses (in a good way) haha def my next purchase.

I received this in sample for and love it so much, I'm going to have to get a full size now.  The lovely rose smell is just perfect for me. If you love the scent of roses, like me, then this is the scent for you
Love this! Very classic rose scent and I love how light it comes on. Definitely one of my favorites.

This scent is a surprisingly classic rose perfume without smelling too mature. It is light and fresh but undeniably floral. I don't think this is complex or warm enough for my everyday signature scent, but is a pretty summer option. I like it!
Amazing. I usually hate how perfums smell after a few hours, but this one just lightly fades away. I love the smell and it doesn't irritate my allergies. amazing!
Smells so good awake my love for roses one the best perfume by Chloe.
top notch rose scent perfume
Smells SOSOSO good, the regular chloe is one of my favorites as well, it was the few that actually lasts long and so does this one last super long!

Love. Love love love. This fragrance awoke me to the fact that I love roses.   It's a fresh, light scent, yet it makes an impact.   When I wear it, people tell me that they can't put their finger on it (they don't think I'm wearing perfume), but I smell good - you just smell fresh.   I wear it to work, I wear it on casual days, I wear it to a special event when I don't want to seem like I'm trying too hard. It has an effortless vibe to it...it's like a beautiful instagram photo that you actually somehow believe has no filter on it.

Love. Love love love. This fragrance awoke me to the fact that I love roses.   It's a fresh, light scent, yet it makes an impact.   When I wear it, people tell me that they can't put their finger on it (they don't think I'm wearing perfume), but I smell good - you just smell fresh.   I wear it to work, I wear it on casual days, I wear it to a special event when I don't want to seem like I'm trying too hard. It has an effortless vibe to it...it's like a beautiful instagram photo that you actually somehow believe has no filter on it.

This is one of my go to perfumes. It does have a nice rose scent but I can also smell other lovely floral notes when I wear it. I find that on me it lasts all day but that's with my body chemistry. Maybe for other people it's different but if you like rosy floral scents then this one is for you. Love it
This is light and delicate, perfect when you don't want to be overpowering but want something special on. Very lovely, and doesn't effect my sensitive nose.
Great perfume! Smells amazing and light.

I was trying to decide between this and Cartier Basier Rose and ultimately went with Chloe because 1. It came in the much more affordable rollerball size and 2. The rose scent was more prominent.   The Rose scent is not over powering like the Rose perfumes of our great grandmothers but is enough to be noticeable.
This has a lovely, light rose scent without being overpoweringly floral. It's perfect for summer.
Very sophisticated smell, powdery and floral not a very strong scent but strong enough to keep you smelling delish through out the day. One of my fav!

It smells very nice, not overpowering old lady rose smell. It's perfect to wear in the daytime . The only problem is the scent doesn't last very long because it's eau de parfum . The original Chloe is amazing though , I will stick to that one again .
light scent of roses, not too heavy. Makes me feel beautiful when I wear it!

I love how subtly floral this perfume is. Sure, it might just be a rose smell to some, but it's definitely a soft floral smell and so feminine In my opinion. I've gotten a ton of compliments on it since I've started wearing it. I definitely think it's not overpowering at all, but for also that same reason, I feel like it doesn't have the lasting power like other perfumes (I.e Escada!!). Overall, this is my new overall go to perfume. It makes me feel so put together for some reason! LOL

I've never been a fan of shopping for perfumes because they can be so overbearing and tend to give me headaches when the scent is too overpowering. I've always stuck to one perfume & it's Marc Jacobs' Daisy.  I received this as a sample & I fell in love!!! I am a huge fan and it's not overpowering as I thought it might be & after a long night out or long day at work or school, the scent manages to stick without having to reapply like I do with Daisy. I've gotten many compliments from wearing this perfume & I'm such a huge fan. I would describe the smell as graceful, with a hint of carefree and sophisticated.   I will definitely purchase a rollerball or a 1oz spray in the near future once my sample bottle runs out.

This is one of my new signature scents! I always get complimented on this perfume when I have it on and people frequently ask me what I'm wearing. I rarely re-apply this perfume, though you could after 6-8 hours if you want. I find even when the smell dies down after a couple of hours, it's still a light, comforting floral scent.

I've never liked the smell of roses in a fragrance as they always smelled like something a grandmother would wear. This fragrance is the exception. It has a hint of roses, but a modern scent of roses. I love it and have given it as a gift as well.

I am a big fan of Chloe and Lovestory so I just knew I had to order this without even trying it in the store. I'm so glad I did! It is a modern and fresh rose scent. It isn't overpowering in the floral or musk department. Also, I love rollerball scents because they are less expensive and I never seem to use even half a bottle of perfume.
Love the smell, so feminine and lovely!

I got this as sample with a purchase and I fell in love!! I own the original Chloe and wasn't a big fan of Love Story so I was hesitant to try this one.  I love the light floral scent which is perfect for the spring/summer season approaching and just like the original Chloe, it literally last all day.
Really beautiful scent, not too overpowering. I got complimented on the scent all day long!!

Few months before, I smelled Chloe's Lovestory and wanted to buy it, but I ended up getting other perfumes.  I'm so glad I didn't get Lovestory and instead found this gem a few weeks ago!  Smelling this after sniffing lots of other scents at Sephora made me a little hesitant of how good this smelled. So I sprayed this on one wrist, went out, and spent the night before smelling it again. Let me rephrase that, I ended up smelling my wrist the entire night! The subtle yet rosy scent is perfect for someone like me who wants a perfume that smells natural with a hint of comforting floral scent. It almost smells like laundry smell due to the fact that it is not overpowering nor too distinct.   The only thing is that I have to keep reapplying every couple of hours, which sucks because even though I smell it, other people probably don't smell it as easily after a while.  Overall though, one of the best perfume I have ever smelled/gotten!
It smells good but not my fave. At least it isn't over powering with the rose scent.

Since I found it it became my favorite fragance, and I really search for fragance because I've rejected a lot of them even the famous ones. But roses by Chlou00e9 is the perfect one, it is not so floral but elegant, it is not Boeing, and everyone who has noticed when I'm wearing it, always ask for my parfum. I'm very happy with it.

This is officially my #1 new perfume. I feel like I took an actual bath in roses every time I spray myself but in a good way! I will say though, I sprayed this on myself and on my mother in law at the store and it smelled completely different on her (much better on me). So that's something to consider. But it lasts all. day. long. on my skin even when I'm sweating! If you love the flowery scents with just a hint of sweet (and don't want to smell like a little child), then this is definitely for you!

If you like smelling like straight up roses that you just cut from your garden then this is for you. There really isn't much depth here. It is very much one note. It's pretty if you like straight up floral scents. I like something a little sweeter smelling.
It's a very pretty scent, but it's very basic. Just a simple rose scented perfume. It smells exactly like a friend of mine's rose hand lotion from the drugstore... i wouldnt bother for the money.
I love this smell. Fresh and feminine it makes me think of being in a rose garden in the summer. I will say I found it cheaper elsewhere...almost half the price. Price shop if the cost is an issue.

This fragrance smells amazing if you love the smell of roses.   This scent seems to not last very long with my body chemistry. I suggest maybe getting a sample and wearing if you would like to see if it last for you.
Love this scent.  Usually I associate rose perfumes with little old ladies, but this one is so modern and fresh.  It's my absolute favorite perfume and a must have for anyone who likes floral scents.
Love this scent! It is my new everyday perfume. I got the medium sized bottle, and you cant even tell that I've used any at all.
This smells like you are in a lovely rose garden. It is not too strong but has decent staying power.
This smell is so subtle yet fresh and rosy. I love it, but the only thing is that it does not last so long so you have to reapply several times throughout the day.
Such a pretty scent, only problem is it doesn't last more than a couple hours
I'm SO glad they finally came out with the rollerball version!!! I love it for touch ups and for traveling. I have the large bottle, but this is so much easier to travel with.

I love anything rose scented, so for me, this is the perfect perfume. It isn't heavy or fake, but light, youthful and complex. I bought the big bottle and the roller ball, which I highly recommend for touch ups. The only downside is that it doesn't really last, even if you have oily skin and hair that tends to hold fragrance well, but I love it so much, that I will continue to re-wear.
This is my absolute favourite perfume, only issue is that it's pretty pricey.

I'm a huge fan or rose scents and I love this! It is a bit strong so I wouldn't recommend it for a working, close quarters, atmosphere. Or if you has asthma. Other than that, really great scent and want a bottle instead of a sample size for next time!

I absolutely love this perfume. The rose scent is classic and delicate while the other notes give it a more modern edge. It last beautifully and doesn't fade to much, which is a problem I tend to have with scents. This is my new favorite perfume.

I wandered into a Sephora not sure of what I wanted but knew I was there for a new perfume and I smelled the rollerball and oh my goshhhh I was instantly in love with this scent! I love rose scented perfumes and facial mists but sometimes they can smell a bit mature for me but this was floral and beautiful and I immediately threw the roller ball and the medium sized bottle into my basket. Definitely a signature scent for me.

I got a sample of this scent elsewhere and I was excited to try it. The initial spritz smelled wonderful - just like a bouquet of freshly cut roses, stems and all.  But within seconds, it disappeared and turned into a strong soapy smell that I just can't stand (and it made my head ache). It seems like this is a favourite with many people, but it just doesn't work with my body chemistry at all.  It's a shame, because I really love roses and the initial note is something that I love, but it changes into something that really doesn't agree with me.

I fell in love with this perfume the minute I smelt it. I asked for a sample (I really didn't need to spend on a perfume when I have other ones at home I barely use) and found myself spraying some on every day. SOLD!  Keep in mind this is an Eau de Toilette, which is only supposed to last around 4 hrs, compared to Eau de Parfum, which lasts 8hrs. Some days I spray it onto my skin, other days I spray in onto my clothes and it definitely lasts longer on fabric, so if you do want the smell to linger, I would suggest spraying it to your clothes! I love the smell of roses, it's very delicate and appropriate for winter and summer, day and night! I use this every day and now my other perfumes are further neglected ;) I will repurchase!
I love this perfume roller ball, it has just the right amount of rose fragrance, not overpowering at all. Lasts pretty well throughout the day too.

I really like the smell of roses, so I was excited to try this as an alternative to the normal Chlou00e9 Eau de Parfum. It smells really lovely and feminine. In my opinion, Roses de Chlou00e9 smells better on me than the Eau de Parfum u2013 It's much more subtle, with a hint of sweetness; Although there aren't any vanilla notes in this, I find that after a few hours, it gives off a floral-vanilla scent.  All in all, I would definitely recommend trying this if you're a rose/floral fan!

I typically love rose scents and this perfume does a very good imitation of it, but something about it just screams that it's meant for someone much older than myself. It's also a bit on the strong side, so I don't recommend wearing it to work.  Would be good to wear to church or formal events, but too sober for anything else.
I LOVE the smell of it. But not so much into the roller ball form.

ever since i smelled this in an issue of vogue, i had been in love. this fresh floral scent is now my signature scent. i have never been able to stick to one perfume until i found this one. and if my husband notices it and likes it, then it definitely has a permanent spot in my bathroom.
Up until now, I have only worn Versace Bright Crystal- but this is much lighter and feminine- more natural. It's my new signature fragrance!

Got this as a sample and I am in love. My birthday is soon and I am going to treat myself to this fragrance. If you love the scent of roses, this is the perfect perfume for you. I can't even really describe other than its like when that special someone gives you a bouquet of roses, and you stick your nose right in the center of them and breathe in...that is what this is. The best.

I used a sample of these from a VOGUE magazine and I went to work and I got so many compliments just by using a little amount. I eventually got the full size and I don't regret it. Amazing scent and perfume

reviews.review_title: Beautiful for the first couple of hours
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this perfume as it smells AMAZING when first sprayed it smells so fresh and light and lovely I thought I had found a new signature fragrance. Unfortunately after about two hours of wear I found the white musk and amber to completely take over the fresh rosy scent. It become so overwhelming I had to scrub my wrists and I ended up with a headache. I tried spraying on my clothing in case the very potent musky smell was partially due to my body's chemistry and found no difference. Its a very beautiful fragrance at first maybe if they came out with an EDP the beautiful rosy scent I loved would last. Unfortunately this one will be going back.
I love this scent! It smells like fresh cut roses with hints of other floral scents. It is delicate, feminine, light, and not overpowering. A great everyday scent!
This perfume is so beautiful. It has the essence of roses but not the scent that some rose based perfumes create. This one is much softer, feminine and smells natural.

I am not a floral type when it comes to perfumes especially if it has to with roses it just makes me think of an overwhelming scent of fresh roses. I received this as a sample I first smelled it I was like no and just recently I pulled this sample out again I sprayed it on the card and seconds later I was like wow it smells very nice after it settles. Will be purchasing soon.

In love with this perfume! If it wasn't so expensive I would get a bigger size. I have the original one, but the rose scent in this perfume makes it slightly more elegant and feminine. I've never been one to gravitate towards rose-scented things, but I can't seem to stay away from this one.

I love this scent. I am already a fan of the regular Chole' with the tan ribbon, so I decided to venture out and try this. I was never really a rose scent type of woman because I thought it smelt old and antique, not in a good way; however this fragrance is the PERFECT scent of rose...it's like roses meets the modern age. I get tons of compliments and people ask me what I'm wearing and say how fresh I smell.

A friend recommended the chloe perfumes to me and I loved them instantly, and use roses de chloe every morning. Very light and pretty, even two spritzes before I leave the house lasts me all day. A couple girls at work have noticed and said they loved it. I wish they didnt test on animals though, bummer.
I usually gravitate towards fresh scents like d&g light blue. I also love romance by Ralph Lauren and versaces bright crystal. This scent was a little different for me but I love it
I purchased this to use for my wedding. It has a light rose scent that doesn't smell like a grandmother or a child.
This Parfume smells amazing!! I've received lots of compliments on it. Rollerball is very convenient. Definitely recommend!!

Such a lovely scent,. ..I get tons of compliments when wearing it, girlfriends dying to know what perfume I'm wearing. ..pretty pricey though, was hestitant to buy, but have never regretted the purchase. . I reach for it everyday and will continue to purchase.

I love, love, love this perfume. There has not been one time that I've worn it and not gotten a compliment on my scent. This is one of the most beautiful fragrances. It does not smell overly rosey, it's the most perfectly balanced mix to me. This is a must try. Men go crazy for this scent.

I love the scent of roses, so this perfume is right up my ally. I actually got this as a gift for a friend and she LOVED it; it's so elegant, classy, not too overbearing, and it does not smell matronly, soapy, or fake, which can happen with some rose scents. This is a very beautiful rose perfume; not too sweet. It's balanced perfectly and I think it's one of the best rose perfumes I've ever smelled. I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves roses, it's so beautiful!

reviews.review_title: If you love the scent of roses...
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is absolutely gorgeous. Has a lush, rich scent yet is delicate and very feminine. No cloyingly sweet floral here. Perhaps this true 'rose' scent seems a bit more complex because it's grounded by a hint of musk. Whatever it is, I love it. Has a moderately good wear time-about 5 hours. I really like the timeless appeal of a traditional fragrance but this version has a modern twist and it works. I recommend if you're into roses!

reviews.review_title: Smells lovely but no staying power
reviews.review_text: Very faint sent of roses.. smells good but unfortunately the smell does not last
Love this rose scent. I get so many compliments on it. It doesn't smell like powdery roses, it's fresh and clean. The longevity is great too.
I love this fragrance! I've tried a few scents and they were way too overpowering. This is nice and light, everything I'm looking for!

I first got this as a Sephora sample and instantly fell in love with it, so I bought a full size. It's fresh, clean, and feminine. It has a hint of roses, but doesn't smell old lady-ish, which I think is always a concern with rose scents. It's kind of like fresh cotton and roses. I got samples of classic Chloe and Chloe Love Story when I bought the full size Roses, and now I'm a huge Chloe fan!
Love the smell of this perfume. But doesn't last long. It's funny because I thought it was only me until I read other reviews. Wish I read them before purchasing.

I have a hard time finding rose scented products that I like because most of them don't smell like a real rose to me. This perfume really captures the fresh cut rose scent and is so light and pretty to wear. I love the fresh and clean scent and how subtle it is. The only downside for me is that the scent is so light it needs to be reapplied every few hours. I don't mind normally, but if I'm going to be out and about all day I'd like to smell pretty all day. This is a perfume that has a permanent place in my collection.

This was exactly what I was looking for! I love a perfume that you can easily smell during a hug, but doesn't fill an elevator or leave a trail behind you. Light, sophisticated, feminine, soft, and romantic. I think the description on the site is exactly how I would describe the scent as well. I haven't noticed that it wears off as quickly as other reviews have noted. I can still smell it on my wrists 7 or 8 hours later.
I love this scent more than any other I've ever had. Its the most pure rose scent and the roller ball makes it so easy to apply. LOVE!

This is my go to scent. It's perfect for day and night. People always ask what I'm wearing when I use this. I went through a few bottles already because I love it so much! The only downside is that the scent wears out after a few hours.
This is a delicate scent. It really does smell like fresh cut roses. It's not what I would pick for my signature scent, but it's light and can be used during the day without being over powering.
I received a sample and I'm in love! This is a beautiful rose scent. I love how this is not overpoweringly floral and has a slight musk to it.

reviews.review_title: If you love roses, you'll love this!
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance! I loooove roses and if you do too, you'll love this scent! It's like a flowery burst of scent and the fragrance lasts and lasts. A little bit goes a long way! The only reason I took a star off is it can be a LITTLE cloying but I may have just used a little too much. Like I said, a little goes very far with this perfume! Enjoy!!!

The first time I picked this bottle up I was kinda hesitant to spray this thinking I would hate it since I can't stand the original Chloe but once I sprayed it on my arm I thought Omg I must have this. It is so beautiful!!! It smells just like a rose with no other scents added. So perfectly done and last for many hours expecially if you spray your clothes. I love Stella for evening time and Roses de Chloe for day wear. It's so feminine. If you are looking for a sexier rose smell you need to get Stella but if you want a clean true Rose scent try this. It's so beautifully done.

I personally love Chloe Eau de Parfum so I had too see what else Chloe had and then I smelled this. I didn't buy it on spot because I already have my signature perfume which is Chloe Eau but I couldn't stop thinking about this one. I bought it and I love it. It legit smells like ROSES. It's heavy scented but spray it in your hair and you'll smell amazing. It does wear off a little faster than Chloe Eau but it's a nice soft girly scent especially for a dinner date or a walk at the mall lol

The scent itself is amazing. I don't understand why people are complaining when they could have simply gotten a sample before purchasing, but that's none of my business. Anyways, very girly scent, & obviously floral. Only con is that the bottle started to tarnish after a couple of months. Started out silver, & now it looks disgusting, as if it were rusted.
One of my absolute favorite perfumes ever! Glad it was made into a perfume for traveling and carrying on me.

I'm really happy they made this as a rollerball! I had the perfume originally but I had to return it because the scent was so overpowering, and I would only use one spray! it was just too much, with the rollerball you can control how strong you want the perfume. The scent is an amazing rose scent!

reviews.review_title: too clean if you like darker rose scents
reviews.review_text: i love rose but this was just not my cup of tea. it's very chemical smelling and far too clean for my tastes. smells like so many other scents and is not very interesting or original, but then i prefer darker and deeper rose scents.
I love this scent. A very sweet rose. Not as overpowering as the original Chloe, and won't give me a headache. I'm glad they have a rollerball cause the bottle is over my budget as of now.
I adore this perfume and I am so thrilled they made the roller ball!!

This bright, classic scent lasts all day on my skin! I feel elegant and grown up when I wear it. such a gorgeous bottle, looks so sweet on the vanity. Very bright rose, not overpowering. Better during cooler months.
So happy this scent is finally available in rollerball form!
Very floral; smells just like fresh cut roses upon first spray. Mellows nicely throughout the day. I get lots of compliments and my husband loves it. Highly recommended if you're a rose lover!

Received this as a free sample with other purhases. The scent at first is of a fresh rose direct from the greenhouse. At this point I would say that it Is. Not. Subtle. But I think it's still nice if you don't overdo it. This strong scent slowly fades and becomes mellowmellow, reminding me more of what I smell when I smell roses from a distance. I will be very likely to purchase a full size bottle.

LOVE THIS. I have never been such a big fan of rose scented perfumes but this is different. I got it as a gift and I have been wear this everyday since I got it! I hope Sephora makes a rollerball of this scent though.
I love this. I am obsessed with the smell of roses and this is pure beauty in a bottle! Its so rare to find such a pure smell of roses. Doesn't last all day though.
Love this perfume, I got a sample and wore it on my wedding day. Loved it so much I had to buy the full bottle. It's fresh but flowery, not too sweet. It's a romantic scent for sure.

This fragrance is straight up roses. It reminds me of walking through a rose garden at a botanical garden. A bit green, very fresh, sweet but not syrupy. It's dry down is a bit powdery but not too much so. A faint hint of musk after an hour or so. I adore it BUT I deducted one star because it does not last long. Excellent for summer, won't overpower or get too strong on a hot day. Suitable for all rose lovers!
If you're looking for a modern fragrance with a rose base, this is the one for you.

My favorite rose perfume was the Valentino Rockin' Rose and I love Dolce and Gabanna rose The One. They discontinued Valentino and did not want to repeat D&G. I decided to try this one by Chloe and it is beautiful. It's not a perfume I get a lot of inquiries or compliments on. It's subtle and elegant in my opinion. I wear to work and out on casual days. Want to try the Stella Mcartney one next and see how the Rose scent is in that!

I sprayed this on myself in sephora and waited a few minutes before deciding on buying it. It was great but after a few hours the scent changed into a terrible smell. Will return this. Such a shame, i really like the inital smell
When I first sprayed this on, it smelled so fresh and rosey.. As the day progressed, it changed it's scent.. it made me nauseous. It turned out so sweet and potent..
I love love love this! The smell is amazing!

When I tried it at first, i didn't like it at all. I found the smell too strong kinda smell like an old lady perfume. So I decided not to buy it. What a mistake. After I left the store the smell was wonderful. I'm addicted to it. It last all night. I washed the dishes and the smell was still on my wrist. I love it so i bought it online. Can't wait to received it.

I was so exciting about this scent but the staying power was limited to about 3 hours if that. I have the Chloe original scent and I can smell it on my clothes/hair the next day and even days later. This is sadly going back
smells really fresh. i get compliments all the time that i smell really good <3
i received this perfume first as a sample from sephora. this was about 2 years ago now im hooked ! smells light and sweet and get several compliments at work and from friends. <3 Roses De Chloe !

Rose is a divisive love it or hate it fragrance, so I don't know if I would purchase this without testing it first. However, for rose lovers, this is a very light and fresh approach, and in my opinion, it's not weighted down by that powdery rose smell some other perfumes have. It's a more modern take on roses, and it's completely lovely and feminine.

A beautiful scent on women of all ages. Fresh, young, naturally sweet, vibrant. I can imagine it on a young girl and she wouldn't smell too mature or sophisticated. I can imagine this on old grannies and they would give off a young and fresh vibe. I love this perfume so much, I can never find any perfume as good. I tried the Daisy Eau so Fresh, was nice at first but oh God it got way too sweet, I can only imagine that as 5 year girls play toy perfume. The Chloe Rose starts off fresh, young and naturally sweet(doesn't feel synthetic), then it gradually shifts to a warmer rose scent. I do have Chloe EDP but Rose is just perfect to me~ I can sniff it for ages. For all other perfumes, I will sniff and take a breath because they are too synthetic, too strong, not so natural(can be headache-inducing).  It's one of the few high end beauty product I'd ever repurchase! Worth the $100. HG beauty product.

I have not loved a fragrance in a very long time. I definitely own a lot of perfume, but this one has become my all the time fragrance. It lingers on your skin and has such a beautiful soft smell. It's feminine, appropriate for work, or for a romantic date.

I know Chloe is an older brand. My mom wore the original Chloe when she was in her 20s. It still reminds me of her :) Roses de Chloe is amazing, a light and fresh floral scent that is definitely roses, but not in a grandma way. I feel very feminine and beautiful when I wear this. Also, it's light and airy, so a guy will have to lean in to smell the scent ;)
I feel so pretty when I wear this perfume. It's very fresh and light and romantic. I wear this when I go out at night or on days when I need a little confidence boost. Definitely a favorite.

reviews.review_title: Loved the perfume, but my bottle tarnished!!
reviews.review_text: Perfume is gorgeous, I love the smell and it will always be my favorite, but it is WAY too expensive, hopefully I will be able to get a new one as a gift one day... Also my bottle completely tarnished after 2 months of use, I wonder if this has happened to anyone else... but for $70 a bottle, I hope my bottle is perfect, so I wasnt too thrilled about that :(
I fell in love with the perfume as soon as I smelt it. It's so fresh and beautiful. 5 stars all the way:)

I've been in love with this scent for months and I finally decided to just buy it. I love it and everybody around me loves it. It's a classic smell with a beautiful rose touch..what's there not to like about it?? 5 stars all the way!

I absolutely LOVE Roses De Chloe! The negative reviews concerning this perfume are laughable, a single scent of perfume does not smell good on everyone. Pheromones and natural oils can significantly impact how your body takes on a scent, so in short, if a perfume doesn't smell good on you, it could be due to your composition, not due to a bad product. Its just like different makeups and face washes work better/worse for different people. For me, I thought the scent held well throughout the day, but then again, I don't exactly want to smell like I bathed in an ocean of perfume, so maybe people have different standards for how smelly they want to be. I always get the smallest bottle of perfume or try samples prior to purchasing, which is exactly what I did with Roses De Chloe and I absolutely fell in love. The one thing I will say is that the silver part of the bottle ended up tarnishing really bad.

Roses De Chloe is a lovely scent, but has absolutely no staying power. Less than two hours after I put it on neither my husband or I could detect even the faintest trace of this fragrance. For the price it should stay with you longer. I returned it.
I really like the way this smells, Rosy with a hint of fruitiness that is not overpowering. I just wish it lasted longer on me, and was less expensive.

I got this as a sample in the store to see how well it did on my skin. Stays on all day and smells very good. You can definitely smell roses yet it's not over powering. If your looking to buy this i still suggest going to the store smelling it, maybe getting a sample though. Perfumes are tricky and may not work for your skin.So if you have the means i highly recamend getting a sample.
Leaves such a fresh rose smell without it being overwhelming. Will definitely order again.

I'm picky about perfumes. I want to smell like a girl, which means floral to me. I particularly like rose scents, which are hard to find. This one is really nice-- not too strong, but pleasant, soft, hinting of rose. I really like it!
I love this scent so much its so gorgeous! Its fresh but still sophisticated. It has very similar notes to the original Chloe fragrance but has rose obviously. Definitely going to repurchase!
I love it! Just wish it wasn't so expensive!!

Bought this for my bday in February....LOVE IT! I have used original Chloe before but, scent just kinda started to get to me....decided to try the small size in this! It is great, and my hubby and 3.5 year old liked it!  Good purchase!
I adore this scent! I haven't worn it much yet, as I generally wear floral scents during Spring and Summer, but the times I have worn it, I've gotten many complements.

Though I originally thought I liked the scent enough to buy it, it gets too sweet as time goes on. Don't think I will finish the bottle. It is too bad that L'eau Chloe is no longer available-it was a much more original scent and I was asked frequently what it was. Now I can't buy it any more.
Hoped this would be more like an essential oil with stronger scent, but it is pallid and I'm disappointed.
I absolutely love this. I just bought it and I highly recommend it. Its versatile and classy. I normally don't like such floral smelling perfumes but this one is amazing.

Chloe always does it right. This scent is just beautiful and has pretty darn good staying power. This is truly unique and timeless. I am 30 years old and I feel like a young 20 something to a woman in her 80s could wear this and wear it well.
I'm on my third bottle of this! I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone.

I am seriously picky when it comes to perfumes; I think a lot out there is too artificial. But when my mom told me to smell this there was the woah moment. I did the same thing to my sister and I could tell from her face that she was surprised by how nice it smelled (she said the words too). The scent is very subtle and natural, unlike some of the rose-scented products that are trying to get you chocked up and paralyze your nose.
This perfume does not smell like roses, it is insulting to the nose. It is so powder like smell. Why I cannot find a perfume that actually smells like roses. Smells cheap. Like powder.
Got this as a vib reward and loved it! Had to buy the big bottle. It smells really feminine and yummy :)

I adore this scent! Between See by Chloe and Roses, I have my new signature scent(s). I can't choose just one to be my mainstay!! However, PLEASE make a rollerball of this scent. I wear See more often, mainly because I can take the rollerball with me and refresh my fragrance throughout the day. Get compliments every time I wear both fragrances.

I'm not a flowery smeliing type of person but this scent is wonderful!! Its light and not overpowering. Absolutely wonderful. I just wish it was a wee bit stronger in scent but its not a deal breaker for me at all. This is my first Chloe scent and hopefully not my last.
I love the ultra feminine scent and beautiful bottle. I'm wary of it smelling a bit too old lady, but it's wonderful, fresh and very lovely on.

I'm not usually a 'rose' scent fan, but this is amazing. It's so light and is such a unique classic scent, I get compliments non stop while wearing it. It has become my absolute favorite scent and I cannot be happier!

This smell is absolutely wonderful but i find myself spraying 4 times and about 3 times a day for it to be noticeable. Lasting power is a 2 out of 5. Also very little product and a weak lasting power for the price HOWEVER its my new go to scent.
This is my favorite perfume and I think it's become my signature scent! The smell is similar to the Chloe, but with a stronger rose scent. It lasts all day and I've been complimented on it before!
i feel in love with it at first smell ! i get so many compliments on it. roses de chloe is one of those perfumes thats not to overwhelming , and perfect for a daily use

I wanna start out by saying how oddly lovely this perfume is. It's *so* rosey at first, but morphs into the more musky tones as the day goes on. It is just as lovely and floral, but with more depth.  That being said, I'm fairly disappointed that it doesn't come in an eau de parfum, just the eau de toilette, especially for the price.
