Maybe that's me being picky, but eau de toilette has more alcohol (usually to make it cheaper and more marketable, yet this is just as expensive as any standard perfume). That extra alcohol makes it so it doesn't smell as good right out of the bottle, then evaporates quicker and therefore doesn't last as long.  It's super lovely and I'll continue to wear it, I'm just wondering why it doesn't come in a true perfume?
Love it, simply elegant and I feel a lift in my spirits when I spray the fragrance!

I received this as a gift from an acquaintance of my husband's, whom I've never met. I thought, a fragrance?!? Seriously??? He's never MET me! I don't love very many rose scents, other than sticking my nose in a flower, thinking it's beautiful, yet not wanting to wear that on my skin. WOW- did Chloe nail this one!! Impeccable and gorgeous. It feels very sophisticated, classic and still fresh and sexy. Not what typical rose fragrances convey, but to me- far more interesting and fantastical. And still, it's such a rose. I am shocked at how much I love this.
I absolutely adore this scent. I'm not big on rose fragrances but this is not your grandmother's perfume. It's young, yet elegant and completely unforgettable!

I had my eye on this for such a long time and I finally got it for Christmas. Unlike many other reviewers, I have found that this pretty much stays all day for me. I'll get whiffs of it even towards the end of the day. Also, I'm not huge into floral scents, but this one is not like any others.
This perfume is great. It smells amazing. It's a little small for the price.

I smelled this perfume yesterday and bought it without a second thought! It reminds me of something marilyn monroe would wear. Sexy bold rose, with hints of playful vanilla & innocent powder. Looooooove It!!!!
I really love the soft scent of roses, this is one of my favorites.
Smells like something an old woman would wear. Not the one for me.

Love this fragrance, although I am a bit on the fence about its lasting power. I have to spray it more than four times, which I do not mind cause I am obsessed with the scent- and I get a lot of compliments with it.
I have received so many compliments when I wear this fragrance. I love how classic and feminine - very lady like. This is a keeper in my fragrance wardrobe.

I am completely obsessed with this scent; it smells very fresh and floral. It would be nice too if they made a rollerball version so I could carry it everywhere I go! I also wish they also made an eau de parfum version because I find it doesn't last all day... If you like floral perfumes, you will not be disappointed with this one! Totally worth the money!

I have not worn perfume regularly for over ten years (I'm 34 now), due to my incalculable pickiness as well as a perfume/cologne allergy (makes me sneeze, itchy nose, headaches). HOWEVER...I got a whiff of this scent from an ad in a magazine and I HAD to have it. My order came a week ago and I've worn it every day. No allergic reaction AND I feel more confident wearing this scent.  Like a previous poster said, it doesn't last all day for me -- I would say about 4 hours. I do wish it lasted longer because I LOVE LOVE LOVE it!

This is an amazing scent. It has fantastic staying power. I can smell it on my skin and clothing at the end of the day. I expected it to be a very mature scent because most rose based perfumes seem to be but it's not. It's really a beautiful scent for every day.
I've always loved Chloe scents and so when they came out with this new one, I just had to have it! And it did not disappoint! It is now my favorite scent to wear- day and night.

reviews.review_title: an even more romantic take on the original
reviews.review_text: I am a Chloe girl through and through, it's my signature scent :0) but this Roses de Chloe version takes it to the next level with heightened rose notes that I love. Not really for every day, but perfect for a romantic night out or adding that little je ne sais quoi maybe to catch someones attention and leave a lasting impression. Enjoy lovelys!
I could never decide between this and the regular Chloe but Im in love with both. Amazing winter scent

reviews.review_title: Love it but it doesn't last
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of roses that this has, but it definitely does not last. I'll spray it on in the morning before work and 3 or 4 hours later the smell will be completely gone. It's such a shame because this is such a nice perfume. If only it lasted longer!
I like it very much !!!!!!!

I'm gonna keep it short and sweet  I love rose scented things because I have the word Rose in my name (I know, super cliche) but any way this is the first rose scented fragrance that is fresh and light. Most other rose-scented perfumes smell a little old and heavy so when I smelled this I got it immediately. I never regret it. I get compliments on it constantly.

I loved this fragrance in store so much that I snatched it up immediately after smelling some sample on my wrist. I loved the Chloe original scent but felt it had become too commonplace to wear.  Sadly, this perfume disappears an hour or two after you put it on. The scent is warm and floral, feminine, and light, but it has 0 staying power. I will continue to wear but will continue to keep Stella McCartney as my mainstay.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful scent with minimal lasting power
reviews.review_text: I adore this beautiful scent but sadly had to return it. It's an eau de toilette with very minimal satying power and I couldn't justify paying so much for a scent that barely lasts 2 hours. If they make this into an eau de parfum I will certainly try it again! Such a shame because it really is a lovely scent.

I've been looking for a new fragrance for a long time...I have gone through a ton of perfumes in the past several years, and often, I like a scent for a little while and it quickly becomes too much (or boring!) and leaves me wanting to find a new signature.  I wore the original Chloe for some time, and while I liked it, there was a certain intense -- almost laundry-like -- note that got to me. Roses de Chloe, however, is absolutely perfect.  It's light but still interesting. Very feminine. I can definitely smell the roses, but I am not usually a big rose fan. This perfume captures the essence of a very fresh, almost citrus-y rose, not necessarily a traditional, powdery rose.  A lot of reviewers are mentioning that the fragrance doesn't last too long on them. I actually notice the opposite! A spray on my wrists, neck, and hair is enough to last me all day, even though the fragrance is quite subtle...  Also, it doesn't hurt that my boyfriend really likes it...and he's gotten to be pretty picky, given that I test out perfumes so frequently!  I definitely recommend this fragrance if you're looking for something light, fresh, and a little floral. Certainly my new favorite! I don't foresee myself looking for a change of pace for some time.

Every time I wear this, I get compliments. The original Chloe was my personal favorite, but now I combine it with this one and they layer beautifully. Even on its own, this one is amazing. It is a very modern take on a classic rose fragrance. It is not your grandmother's rose perfume, but it's not so far out of the rose spectrum that it smells like rose chemicals the way other perfumes sometimes will. It's not powdery, just fresh and light and absolutely perfect. It's the one fragrance that my daughters and I can agree on. It is perfect for any age. Normally I rotate fragrances on a fairly regular basis, except for the original Chloe, which is the only perfume I have ever purchased more than twice. This one is my favorite of all time. It's not too strong, not too soft. It strikes a perfect balance. I have friends who are irritated by many perfumes, but this one does not bother them in the slightest. I don't know what Chloe did, but they have struck THE perfect balance in this one. If you like roses at all, you will love this fragrance. People say the scent doesn't last long, but what I find is that I don't smell it on myself after maybe 5-6 hours, but others still smell it up to at least 10 hours later, and I think that's a pretty decent amount of time for it to last.

I have never liked any of the Chloe scents so when I got this as a substitution sample for one of my chosen three w my order, I was not very happy. I waited to try it... but when I decided to just go ahead and give it a try, after reading the reviews on here just because, I was shocked at how much I LOVE THIS!! I feel it is light, but that is a good thing. I think it is a very sophisticated blend, even though it is so airy and light. (I've noticed that many high-end perfumes get bad reviews on here if they are a more light, not so heady and/or strong smell, for some reason.)  Anyway, I love to spray this in my hair, I find it lasts longer that way and I get more whiffs of it myself to enjoy it. I also love to wear this to bed- HOW I WISH I COULD AFFORD THAT LUXURY EVERY NIGHT!! Especially since my sample has sadly run out and I must wait forever it feels to save up because this stuff is REALLY EXPENSIVE! I thought about taking off a star for the price, even though I'm well aware that great perfumes come at a great price but this specific brand and scent is just REALLY expensive! But in the end I decided that I love this scent so much that I'm totally willing to drop the cash (once I have it...)  To me, this soft, yet still fresh cut, beautiful rose brightened by Bergamot cannot be beat. I love Bergamot (Early Grey, and Lady Grey Teas) and to find it in a really great perfume was just awesome, and I do smell the lovely floral of Magnolia that feels like a fresh, yet sensual and carefree warm night. At first, the dry down on me confused me- it smelled like a sweet smoke, like a sweet tobacco and I felt concerned that I'd made a horrible mistake by spraying this on me and that a days' long migraine attack was about to strike, but SO luckily this did not happen! I still continued to get that warm, not overly smoky dry down, and it made me question if I liked this scent all the way through it's life-span on me. After wearing this to bed several nights because it just really calmed me down and helped me sleep (which is a horrible task for me) I smelled this blend unfold more and more and now I love that dry down. It is not powdery, I really hate anything powdery, but this still manages to be soft and clean and now I even crave that warm, soft, almost sweet tobacco scent.

At first spray it is a beautiful bloom: fresh, soft, vibrant. It evolves into a mature a musky rose, heavier round my neck, its youth matured. By afternoon, it reeks of death, becoming an invisible choking cloud collar. Not recommended.

I can't even put into words how much I love this fragrance. I've been lusting after this one for a couple months, and finally received a bottle yesterday. Wearing this makes me feel so pretty, and I can't stop smelling myself! I've never liked any fragrance as much as this one. The experience is feels like I bathed in hundreds of rose petals with a hint of baby powder and vanilla. I will continue to wear this always.

I've had this sample for ages, but tried it for the first time today. In a five-hour period, three people complimented the scent and asked me what I was wearing. I love this scent, and would describe it as light, not too floral, though a strong rose, not a powdery note to be found. Still I was surprised at the response. It's a perfect every-day perfume. I personally didn't think it had staying power, but again, still receiving compliments at hour five without reapplication.
I simply love this perfume. It's light and fits for any time and occasion. It does not last the whole day, but I always have a little one in my purse to reapply.

reviews.review_title: Lovely scent but not long lasting
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is amazing. It is lovely and very light and rosy smelling. However, it is extremely light and the scent does not last long at all. Despite this, it is still one of my favorites of my large collection.
I've found my signature scent! The perfume has a light rose scent and also smells sweet but not overly sweet like candy. It's also long-lasting.

This is the best rose scent I tried so far, not overly cloying, pure dry rose scent that do not smell like grandmas perfume. I really like it, I'm just not sure I want a rose scent anymore. It's also a EDT only which I normally stay clear of.
I'm obsessed with this scent, it is a soft rosy scent that is still noticeable. So many people compliment it it always makes my day!
I absolutely love the smell of this perfume.! But they need to create a rollerball for it to go in my purse! It's is also very long lasting and smells like actual roses!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!

reviews.review_title: Best rose scented perfume I've tried
reviews.review_text: If you like roses, or rose scented things you need this perfume. I went in Sephora for a completely unrelated item but I always swatch perfumes and scents as soon as I arrive to the store to test their staying power while I browse other things. I kept reaching for the little paper that had this scent and every time I took a whiff of it, not only would it last was also intoxicating in the best way possible! When my hubby came to pick me up I made him smell the perfume lol and he absolutely loved it, he couldn't get enough of it and got it for me haha! So yeah ladies this perfume is awesome. Fantastic modern and vibrant roses scent, the throw is awesome as well since I have many people complementing me every time I wear this perfume and they always want to know the name of it. And lastly, it stays for a long time!! I wear this perfume all day and by night time I can still smell it in my hair and neck when I'm in bed! 5 stars for sure!  PS: The lady that was helping me at Sephora also recommended Rosabotanica and Rose The One by Dolce & Gabbanna and while they are all amazing, Chloe wins in the striking rose department. So if you are torn between those scents I'd go with Chloe all the way if rose is your thing.

LOVE. I find it hard to find a purely rose scented perfume. So many rose based perfumes are mixed with other scents, but this one just smells strictly rose. I find the scent to also be unique while original. You can definitely recognize the perfume, but its a subtle recognition. The only setback for this perfume is how long it lasts. It starts to fade after a few hours (2-3), but i find buying this product is worth it because the scent is so clean and pure.

I am a rose addict and it is hard to find a perfume that smells like roses without an old lady must attached. This smells like fresh roses that just bloomed in a bottle. Absolutely marvelous. It lasts about 4 hours and then its time to reapply. I don't mind it bc it is just so amazing i get excited. I carry it around in my atomizer for touch ups. It is a splurge but nothing compares so it is well worth it.

I hate the smell of roses - yes, I really do. For some reason though, when I tried this scent I was converted. It is SO beautiful but the rose scent isn't a slap in the face. It's light, crisp, and feminine and it lingers beautifully throughout the day. I just wish they made a jumbo bottle!
Beautiful scent with a base of roses; not cloying. Only problem is it fades very quickly.
I am a huge Miss Dior fan, I received a sample of Roses and am in love. It is my go to perfume. Friendly for daytime and dates!

I had been coveting this scent for months, finally bought it and was disappointed because the scent was gone, so quickly, within 2 hours honestly. The scent is lovely, like fresh cut roses, but not worth the price.
Recommend this to anyone. Great product
I love this scent so much! I just wish it lasted longer. I have the original chloe cream but it it would be nice if this came as a partum or if they had a cream for this version too
This scent is sensuous in a subtle way. My lover tucked his nose into the nape of my neck and said, 'babe-you smell good!' Nice. I was promptly rewarded for the sexiness of it...
Great scent for spring. Smells like clean roses, not the powdery kind your grandma wears.

Definitely one of my favorite perfumes.. It's very floral,chic and elegant. Perfect for those who doesn't wanna go over the top! Perfect for those spring and summer date nights!! Superb long lasting effect!!!
i love the smell... its so feminine and sweet but one thing is it doesn't last longer
I love everything about this scent! A touch of rose, but not overpowering. Just the right amt! This may be my new favorite!
Positively delicious! I cant say enough! Just perfection!

The ONLY bottle of perfume I have ever finished till the last drop is Chloe EDP. That was a few years ago, and since then I've been on the hunt for a new signature perfume, as I smell Chloe EDP on so many people and it's starting to seem overdone. This rose edition is beautiful, sparkly, airy, and so feminine. It has a citrusy freshness layered over this soft musk that reminds me of a cream colored shawl or blanket. Although I fell in love with this, the issue is that it seems to be barely noticeable! My boyfriend said to me today do you wear perfume anymore? even though I've been wearing this for weeks. The staying power is also very weak. Otherwise, it's gorgeous!

I have been trying to find the perfect rose scented perfume, and this is it. If you love rose, you will love this. I spritz this two times every day, and it lasts forever. So, it might seem expensive at first, but once you purchase this, it will be totally worth it.

reviews.review_title: lovely but fade away so quickly
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, so soft and cute, just like a fresh cut rose. However, it only last on me for about 2-3 hours. Then it disappears like never sprayed =.= This fragrance is definitely for summer :3

I bought this as a Mother's Day gift for my Mother after smelling a sample. It reminded me of the way she smelled when I was growing up. She was so thrilled to receive it since her previous perfume was no longer made and this one almost smells like it. It has been about 20 years since I last smelled rose perfume on my Mom and it is such a joy to have her smell like roses again. This is just the right hint of roses and not an over powering scent at all.

Got this as a sample and immediately, unexpectedly fell in love! Could not stop smelling my wrist all day, so I ordered a full bottle as soon as I got home from work. I love perfumes but easily get headaches from so many of them; no problems whatsoever with Roses. This is a romantic yet very clean 21st-century rose - no powder and no thick, immature candy-sweetness. In my mind I picture a simple glass bud vase with a freshly-cut pink garden rose. The white musk and amber are like the vase itself and the bergamot and magnolia are the water inside, all of which lightly surround and support the pure rose scent. I think it's just heavenly! It's a subtle fragrance that will last through most of your workday, but you will definitely need to re-apply if you want it to last through the evening. If you prefer stronger, more complicated and noticeable perfumes, then Roses probably will not be your cup of tea.
It is wonderful perfume. I like it.....

I purchased Bvlgari roses without trying a sample on my skin thru the mail and it smelled so strong and musk like on me. I didn't smell any blackberry or rose at all. This is my favorite perfume! It lasts and it smells like a fresh bouquet of roses. Just beautiful! I love all things roses. Purchase this if you want many compliments and to smell fresh and pretty! Great scent. So happy with my purchase.

Count me as another fan - the fragrance lasts and lasts and has a distinct rose scent that's never overpowering. It's a complex blend - not little-old-lady-powdery. And best of all, my husband loves it! He says it smells fresh and clean. It's a little pricey but worth every penny.

Roses des Chloe is great if you're looking for strong rose notes to be the main star in your perfume. The staying power is decent, but I did find myself reapplying after several hours, but it had decent wear time.

I've been looking for a simple rose based perfume for so long, and this is definitely it! It's not too sweet or musky, and, as other reviewers have commented, it really just smells exactly like a bouquet of roses. Perfection!

this perfume is perhaps the most beautiful perfume I have ever used. I feel so clean, feminine, and pretty when I wear this. I really like how delicate the fragrance is because it seems to go along with the theme of the soft, beautiful rose--which shouldn't be overpowering! the perfume is gorgeous and smells of soft florals (roses) with just a hint of added sweetness so you don't feel like your literally walking around carrying roses. absolutely perfect!

I am a total perfume collector! I have about 30 different ones... I went into Sephora to try out and possibly buy Chanel Chance. I ended up spraying this on my wrists, loving it, and then buying a bottle. It smells so classy and beautiful. It last about 6 hours on me which is pretty good. I only buy Parfums but because this one didn't have one.. I didn't want to pass up this lovely scent, I just went for it and purchased a Toilette. It is well worth the money. Makes me feel like a million bucks! <3

I got this as a sample and I really love it. I used to think that Chloe had an old lady smell, but this smells amazing, it also lasts all day. Eve though it's pricey, I'll definitely will be purchasing this.
This is the most lovely scent of roses that I have ever smelled. Will definitely repurchase!

This smells fantastic. If you like the smell of roses you will like this. It really does smell like putting your face in a fresh bouquet of them. Just beautiful. For everyone who complains about the scent not lasting all day long, it IS an eau de toilette, not an eau de parfum. They are lighter and not as long lasting. I do wish they would release this scent as a parfum, but it smells so dang wonderful I'm willing to deal with it and throw on an extra spray if I go out at night.
For the price I expected lasting scent.
My previous perfume love was Daisy, which I adore. But this is even better!! Such a romantic and feminine smell :)

I'm loving my new purchase! I love all of the Chloe perfumes, but this one was so fab that I had to have it in its full size. Such a girly and flirty scent, with a hint of rose, not too strong, its lovely!
Rose scent that is clean and light. I rarely like scents other than my usual MarcJacobs. I just love this.

I got a sample and loved every drop of it so I bought the 75ml bottle. But now that I have it, it seems like it's less potent than the sample. It smells beautiful but becoming more ordinary as I use it, and it doesn't last more than an hour. You have to reapply multiple times during the day.
I could have bought a bouquet of roses for myself but they wouldn't last as long nor would I be able to wear them. I love this cologne , it is my gift to myself.

I so wanted to love this perfume, after reading all the positive reviews about it, but I didn't. It does not smell remotely of roses, to me. It smelled more like an old lady perfume. I have come to the conclusion, after many attempts to like floral perfumes, that they just aren't for me. They are usually too overpowering, too in your face, and cause headaches for me. This perfume wasn't any different. By the time I took ONE whiff, I had a headache, and I just didn't care for the fragrance. Nothing like roses, and I love roses.

Wow! This is definitely my new favorite. It has a delicate scent and is so full of roses. A very natural rose smell and absolutely beautiful. Fresh and flowery while still being very classic as the regular Chloe fragrance is.
This fragance make me feel sexy and romantic at the same time...i love it, is a jewelry!

It's usually a bit hard for me to find a perfume I can wear daily, as a lot of fragrances make my eyes watery (bad allergies). This one, however, is a winner. It makes me feel like I'm taking a stroll through a beautiful English garden. It's a light scent -- not overpowering at all -- yet it's so lovely, I want to just smell it on my skin all day (it's weird, I know). If you're looking for something light and floral that doesn't smell like your grandma's house or the overpowering odor of a department fragrance stand, this is the one.

Lovely natural scent that doesn't feel too perfumy. Initial scent mellows into a clean smell that is so beautiful. I took off one star because similar to other reviewers, it's downside is that it doesn't last.

reviews.review_title: A rose by any other name
reviews.review_text: Rose scent things (lotion, body wash, etc) are my staple. My thing. But sometimes they can smell too powdery. This perfume has the perfect quality that you would expect from the Chloe collection combined with a long lasting rose scent that is really soft and delicate. Imagine if you walked by a bouquet of roses that had just opened up completely and you got a hint of the soft fragrance with just a little sweet kick to it at the end. That's what this smells like. It's also very long lasting (9-5pm). Want it to last even longer? Then dot some vaseline on your pressure points then spritz the perfume on those spots: it'll last longer. I wish it wasn't so expensive but I guess I could do without a few meals...
This is a great scent for everyday use.

I got this as a sample and instantly fell in love. I've always loved the smell of rose but found it to be a but overpowering for everyday use. Not this perfume. It is so beautifully done, from the major notes to the undertones. Classy and romantic, yet surprisingly sexy for a floral perfume. Love this one.

I'm not a girly girl but I love flowery scents and this one is by far my new favorite. Most rose-based perfumes can be overpowering or seem dated (think your grandmother's perfume) and this one is neither. Plus, it does last for hours without reapplication (at least on my skin), and that's a bonus for this busy mom.
I absolutely love the smell of roses. With this I can smell them all day. So glad I found this in my samples. Love, love, love it!!!!

I was going to purchase the original version of Chloe to wear on my wedding day, but found this scent much better suited. It has a signature floral scent without being too powerful. Plus now everytime I wear it, I am reminded of that beautiful day! :)
If you love roses, you gonna loves this! Smells wonderful

This perfume is really the best I have ever used. It is the most lovely smell. It is strongly scented but not overwhelming at all. Everyone loves smelling me too. Its really long lasting and makes hair smell beautiful. The price is very high, but I love the scent so its worth every dollar.
This is the perfect scent. I love the combination of roses and bergamot. Definitely worth a try! It's light, not heavy, and not at all too mature.
Good if you love rose and would like to smell like a rose!

Roses de Chloe is a beautifully crafted floral fragrance. I received a sample from Sephora and feel in love at first sniff, which was shocking because Chloe's namesake perfume and See by Chloe are not my favorite scents. Those two actually triggered migraine symptoms the few occasions I tried to wear them. Roses de Chloe is much lighter than either scent mentioned and has an almost champagne like opening note. I love the bubbly, refreshing nature and how the roses emerge softly while retaining such a natural feel. This is definitely a girlie perfume; nothing edgy or heavy going on in this bottle. I can't give this 5 stars because of the price and the lack of staying power. Don't worry! The scent doesn't disappear in a couple of hours like many lighter perfumes but it isn't one that hangs around either. I'd recommend Roses de Chloe to anyone looking for a spring/summer fragrance that isn't cloyingly sweet or strong in other ways. Also, a rollerball or purse spray would be great!
Love the smell, had to buy another right away so I won't run out.
Such a beautiful scent. I was between this and florabotanica and im so happy i got this instead its a beautiful classy smell
I wanted this the second I smelled it! The original Chloe scent is there, but the rose scent makes it even better. It lasts all day and sometimes to the next day. My new favorite perfume.

reviews.review_title: I want to bathe in this
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with all things rose scented. I had just bought two new bottles of perfume a couple of months ago (prada candy and miss dior) and when I saw this online and read the reviews thought I definitely need I get this when I go through the bottles I am currently on.that plan failed after I received a sample of this with a purchase- I needed to get it right away! Unlike many other things that claim to be rose scented this literally smells like a real bouquet of roses. I try to use all of my perfumes equally and I do love my other ones but it is difficult to not just use this every day- it puts me in such a good mood when I have it on.

Seems the trend this spring is making a rose version of popular perfumes. I've tried a few of them, and this one is my favorite. Still the classy, chic smell of Chloe, but with the added whimsy of a dozen roses.
Love this scent. Great change from the regular chloe but still fresh and light.

Chloe did it again! I love their scents. I was a bit nervous because it's a eau de toilette instead of eau de parfum. Which means the staying power isn't great, but the scent does last. I love, love this scent! The scent reminds me of Chanel's foundation.

This scent is lovely but has absolutely no staying power. It's not worth the price of $130 for a 2.5 ounce bottle. If Chloe were to make a concentrated version of this scent, I would definitely try it. I hope they do!

I absolutely adore this fragrance! I really debated on purchasing it, because I honestly spend most of my money in Sephora on skincare. However, I sprayed it on during my recent trip to the store and couldn't stop smelling my wrist. I just couldn't leave it behind. I like it better than the original Chloe, which I own in the rollerball. I would say this is a softer scent than the original. I definitely recommend at least sampling this to determine if it is your cup of tea.

This is a classic rose scent and nothing more. I don't hate the rose scent but I feel like once you smell one you've smelled them all (Stella, L'eau d'Issey Florale, Le Petite Robe Noir, etc). There is the tiniest hint of powder behind the rose (I guess that's what they mean in the description by white musk?). I sprayed this on at night and in the morning I smelled the powdery musk a little. I definitely do not smell any of the amber that is mentioned in the description. Stella by S. McCartney is rose balanced with amber, so it has a warmth to it while Roses de Chloe has more of a delicateness.  Somehow this does make itself known that it belongs to the Chloe wheelhouse, though. If you are a big Chloe fan you might appreciate it. If you are a rose fanatic, or don't have a rose scent already, this would be a nice choice. If you already have a rose scent, like me, this isn't worth the bother. I sampled it hoping that it would have something noticeably unique, but it didn't.

I bought this as soon as it came out (from Macy's because I and Sephora wasn't carrying it yet, I know, impatient!). I think I had my expectations set too high because I was super excited for this one. It is... just ok. It's nice, fresh, and pleasant, but it doesn't last that long and has an oddly papery note that bothers me. It is slowly growing on me, though. It reminds me of Rosabotanica a little bit, also. If you want a nice fresh rose fragrance, this is worth a try, but try it on first, don't blind-purchase like me ;)

This was a blind purchase. I have and love the original Chloe. Such a fresh floral unlike the heavy '90s florals.The rose in this doesn't smell synthetic at all. A very feminine fragrance. I feel so seductive while wearing this! Love this fragrance!
One of the most amazing fragrances I have ever smelled, I love, love, love it. I only wish it lasted longer :(

This is the first rose fragrance I have fallen head-over-heels for. It really is heaven in a bottle. It's light and a touch sweet (the sweet that've smelled from roses and not like cotton candy). It's light and wearable and so pure. Great quality. It last 4-5 hours on my skin. I'm happy to reapply and enjoy the fragrance again. I love having some long lasting fragrances and average lasting fragrances to for light days. I really hope they don't discontinue this item. Many sites say it is limited edition. So get it while you can!!!

I am very sensitive to perfumes and this one is very subtle and delicate and doesn't give me headaches. It is just a beautiful scent, heavenly really. And it lasts all day-- which for me is 6:30 am till 5:00 pm. Love it, love it, just wish it was slightly less expensive.

I received a sample of this perfume and I am so glad that I tried it. It truly smells like a rose, and it is a scent appropriate for an adult as opposed to being overly sweet and girly. Seven hours after applying one spray to my wrist, I can still smell it faintly. I wish it came in smaller full-sized (less expensive) bottles.

reviews.review_title: Heavenly scent of Roses - hoping for Rollerball
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and just fell in love with this heavenly scent. I find the scent of roses to be soft and subtle enough for the workplace. The scent last for the entire day. Hoping to see this in a Rollerball size, soon.

I hate this perfume, mostly because it smells exactly like the My Little Ponies that I played with as a child. I was not fond it then, and I'm not fond of it now. Yes, rose is the dominant note, and I love how it features in Chloe's original scent, but this version is overwhelming in a bad and pungent way.  On the plus side, if you're looking for extremely long-lasting fragrance, this is your ticket-- I can't get it to go away no matter how hard I scrub.

It's hard trying to find a really unique perfume, but Roses is amazing! The scent smells soo irresistible and I get compliments on it everyday! I had this for a little over a month and I am almost out.

such a lovely spring scent. smells just like a bouquet of blushing roses. delicate, dreamy, and romantic.  somehow, my chemistry picks up on the amber base note, giving a slight spicy touch to the rose, so it's not too floral. i only wish it had longer staying power. perhaps a lotion (so i could layer it) or eau de parfum will be created. reapplication is needed throughout the day. otherwise, a new favorite.
Fell in love with this beautiful scent today in store. It smells like a bouquet of roses with a bit of sweetness thrown in. Seemed to last a while. 2 sprays was just right and not over powering.
I love this fragrance, so beautiful, but not overpowering!
Such a beautiful smell. So feminine and dreamy. Lasts for hours. Not overwhelming.
my favorite perfume ever. so pretty.
I just got Roses by Chloe. It is a beautiful light scent. Just what I was looking for. So Romantic. I love the smell of roses.

I love the Chloe scent and have worn it for years. I would say this is a more lighter fragrance. Although its supposed to be more rosey, I somehow am reminded slightly of the original Chloe. The best way for me to describe this is sophisticated rosey scent. My husband likes it, it's not as strong as Chloe.

It's taken me forever to find my signature scent, but I think I've finally found it in Roses de Chloe. There's a quality to it that gives the impression that you've just stepped out of a bath using a luxury soap instead of having just sprayed perfume on yourself. While that may not be what you're going for, I appreciate that kind of subtlety. But as others have stated, you will need to reapply after a few hours or so. A minor inconvenience for such a lovely scent.

I love this perfume - rose is one of my favourite scents, unfortunately it is difficult to find fragrances with true rose notes. This does that and makes me feel amazing. However, it's staying power is less than great. I really hope they make an EDP of this for those of us who would like a longer lasting rose fragrance.

It has such a lovely scent! This one is my favorite out of all the Chloe perfumes! It definitely has a rose scent (which I LOVE) the only thing is that it doesn't last as long, so you need to reapply throughout the day
My favorite of all the Chloe scents. Legitimately smells like roses. My only issue is that the scent doesn't last long at all and reapplication is needed throughout the day.

This scent is absolutely amazing! I'm very picky and this scent is one of the best in a long time. Light and airy but stays on for a long time. I've received many compliments. A repeat purchase for sure.

I love this perfume. It is the truest rose scent I've ever tried. It is classic, but modern. It isn't your grandmother's rose perfume. I've heard it described a soapy, but I didn't get that at all. There is a bit of magnolia, tarragon and amber that make the scent complex and interesting, but the main note of Damascus rose just shines through. My husband keeps burying his nose in my neck, it just smells so good. For reference: my favorite perfume is Stella by Stella McCartney (also Stella Sheer and Stella Nude) and I additionally wear Light Blue by Dolce & Gabbana and Daisy by Marc Jacobs to give you an idea of my preferences.
I can't get enough of this scent! So light and rosy. I use it every day!

I've been searching for a nice rose scent for a while, but to no avail. Most rose notes are too sweet or powdery for my taste. That was, until I found an ad for Roses de Chloe in a fashion mag, and, pleased with the sample on paper, decided to try it on my latest trip to Sephora. Having read your reviews first, I spritzed it on my wrist and decided to do my other shopping first before casting judgement. But I couldn't wait, because every time my arm would pass my face, I found myself intoxicated by the lovely scent of fresh cut roses lingering in the air. I was carrying a 1oz bottle in my basket by the time I left the store, and purchased it with no regrets. The scent is quite reminiscent of that of a fresh bouquet of roses, or a petal plucked straight off a rose, and not an overly-processed, fake odor attempting to replicate the scent of a rose, like a lot of other rose scented products I've encountered. This was a major selling point for me. My only qualm is that this scent is far more expensive than I am used to paying for perfume. I can buy a 3.4oz size of my usual scents for the prize of 1oz of Roses de Chloe. But so far, it appears it should be worth it.

I absolutely love this perfume. My loving boyfriend knows my obsession with rose scented anything (he got me the Dior rose lip balm for christmas) and got this for me for my birthday. It was just the rose scent I was looking for. It doesn't smell fruity or fresh but more of a classic rose perfume that my mom would wear. Its light, but lingers for hours.My mom actually had a perfume that smelled exactly like this when I was little so it just reminds me of her. :) Its definitely not an old grandma scent, but a classic rose. Absolutely love it.

I love Chloe, have worn it for a few years. I also love Roses de Chloe, but not a fan of the Toilette scene. Why couldn't Chloe make this a Parfum too? I enjoy the scent, but there is no staying power. After about 30 minutes it's gone. With Chloe I can smell it 8 hours later. I will finish the bottle then go back to the one that lasts.

I have been looking for a rose perfume for a while now. Roses de Chloe definitely captures the sense of a rose bouquet. It is an elegant soapy rose - like the kind of high quality soap I would put in my guest bathroom.  I am in love with this scent. I purchased the 2.5 oz bottle but wondered if that was too much. After putting the fragrance to the test for a few days now, I think I made the right choice. The down side is the stay power. I usually use 3-4 sprays in the morning. The fresh rose notes wares off in about 3 - 3.5 hours with the last musk and amber notes completely gone around 5 hours. I can get it to last a bit longer if I mist it on my clothing/hair versus the skin. With that said, the 2.5 oz works out perfectly for me when you factor in the extra application throughout the day.  Living in the south, a single hot summer can destroy a bottle of perfume. Thus, I keep my perfume collection in it's original box and in the last drawer of my fridge. Not sure if this is a most appropriate storage technique, but it has worked out so far.
I love this scent. Flowerbomb used to be my favorite but this one definitely beats that. I feel like I can literally smell the rose petals on me! Love love love!
This perfume is by far my new favorite! The smell is not overpowering even though it may seem like it once you put it on but it dries beautifully and very soft.
I'm absolutely in love with this fragrance...perfect blend of roses coupled with the original Chloe signature perfume!! Also, it looks so pretty displayed on my vanity!
amazing perfume! I had the chloe eau de toilette perfume and decided to try this one. It is not overpowering; the rose scent is very subtle. I highly recommend it!

I love the smell of roses so this was a must-buy for me. I previously received the Chloe by Chloe bottle as a Christmas gift and I loved that scent too. This scent is lighter in comparison. The scent lasted for a very long time on me (4hrs +). My only complaint is that for such a high-priced perfume the silver part of the bottle rusted after 2-3 months! None of my other perfume bottles (Chanel, Balenciaga) experienced this. It ruined the luxurious appearance of the whole entire bottle and looks very unappealing next to my other perfume bottles. But I'm still going to purchase knowing this because I really like the rose scent.
I've been searching for a true rose fragrance and this it. Extremely fresh and clean, lasts all day, I love it!

I'm surprised at how much I like this, as I hate the original Chloe fragrance with a passion. This one, Rose De Chloe, is subtle and beautiful. It is the only rose fragrance I would wear. Plus, it lasts quite a while.
Smells just like roses. Its light, airy, and wonderful to wear.
Very feminine and definitely smells like rose without being overpowering

This perfume is so beautiful. The rose fragrance is not overbearing at all but just present enough that you do notice it. Its the perfect balance. Such a lovely daytime fragrance, but can also for sure bring you into the evening. It is such a pretty scent. I love it!

I'm not usually a fan of perfume, but this fragrance is so light, delicate, and feminine that I had to pick up a bottle. It smells like you used rose-scented body wash and just stepped out of the shower. I love that it's rosy and floral without a heavy, powdery smell. It does tend to fade on skin, but I like to spray it on my clothes so the scent stays all day. It's not overpowering or overwhelming at all. Most scents give me a headache, but not this one!
Such a flirty, pretty smell

I LOVE this perfume. Perfect Rose smell and is exactly what I was hoping for when I started out trying to find a rose scent to wear. I just wish the scent lasted a little longer than it does. I can barely smell it on me by the end of a full work day. Still love and will buy again.
It's simple and clean and just lovely! I got a sample at the store and had to go back to get a bigger bottle. The only downside is it doesn't last throughout the day.
The original Chloe has been my signature fragrance for 3 years now. I've also tried the Intense version and now Roses de Chloe'. So beautiful and airy. Two thumbs up.
Love it. Nice delicate rose sent.

lately i have been falling in love with rose based fragrances and this is so far the best. i personally do not like the original chloe perfume but i love wearing this. it's an elegant scent that lingers lightly for me so it's not too overpowering. if you do not like a strong rose scent then i would not suggest this perfume, otherwise it is perfect.
To me this had such a strong rose odor that it was kind of a stinky floral. It seemed kind of old fashioned, like something my grandma would wear. I only had a sample, and am glad I didn't purchase
Absolutely my new favorite perfume! It's perfection.

I was nervous about buying this but I seen so many good reviews that I decided to buy the smaller bottle, it's soooo nice and smells very soft. It doesn't smell tacky or anything. Now it's sold out and I'm looking into buying the bigger bottle!!!!! It's a perfum I think I'll wear for a long time

I'm not typically a rose perfume fan. They never smell right, they never stay very long, and it's just, simply put, disappointing.  Roses de Chlou00e8 is the exact opposite of every other rose scented perfume I've ever tried. The scent itself is just stunning. It's that rose smell we all know and love and does not smell like alcohol. It smells so lovely that I find myself sniffling at my wrists multiple times during the day.  In my experience, the scent also stays on for quite a while - longer than my other perfumes typically do.  This is an ABSOLUTE winner of a scent and I am so glad I stopped and back tracked when a sales person at Sephora was spraying it for people.
I've been waiting for this fragrance after seeing it in Vogue...and I wasn't disappointed. Light, simple, elegant roses...FABULOUS.

The scent is beautiful. I've never bought a bottle of perfume this fast after trying a sample. I also love L'Eau de Chlou00e9, and this scent is just as soft and feminine, but very rose-floral (freshly blooming roses). I love it! The thing that makes me sad, just like most others who have written a review is that it does not last!! Which is extra frustrating since this is an AMAZING scent. I've decided to actually apply it to my hair and clothes in addition to body, but it will run out faster this way. 3.5/5

The scent is wonderful, amazing, chic, floral, sexy!! But I feel like it doesn't last long :( very disappointing for a pricey perfume. I first smelled it from Instyle magazine this february 2014 and I bought this week to be my next perfume, but for me it lasted 2 to 3 hours only a bit sad but it's one of the best smells ive ever owned.
I love the original Chloe but this version is absolutely beautiful and romantic. These fragrances are one of the few that do not give me a headache. I love it!

If you are looking for a good replacement for La Lune, from D&G, THIS IS IT. I have never made a purchase so quick after wearing a perfume for such a short amount of time. This one is the greatest, and to me smells the most like my beloved La Lune that is discontinued!!!
This perfume smells so good! So fresh like the rose, sweet and lasting

I purchased this fragrance after receiving a sample. The scent is amazing, I do not think I have ever been attracted to scent this much before, However, the sad part of the story is the scent does not last. Now I am on the hunt for my next perfect fragrance but I doubt I will like it as much as this one.

reviews.review_title: burst of spring in a bleak Mid-Atlantic winter
reviews.review_text: Being someone who wears original Chlou00e9 as her signature scent, to write a review about how much I LOVE this scent says a lot about this product. The scent differs from the original but not by very much. Roses de Chlou00e9 has a heavier rose top note, (without the Lilly of the valley or freesia notes). Though the undertones of magnolia (found in both) soften the fragrance; making it smell, youthful, fresh, and spring like- and not at all like an old fashioned rose perfume. It's a beautiful fragrance. The only drawback is that being an eau de toilette, the perfume doesn't last as long as the eau de parfum- this can be helped by applying to hair and clothes, but it is still a short term solution. Hopefully (due to the apparent popularity) there will be a parfum version. Either way, the scent is beautiful, romantic, youthful, and keeps spring thoughts in my mind when constant reports of snow are reported.
Amazing perfume , true to its name , fresh young , highly recommend

I used to be a Stella devotee, but needed to move on. I base my review on the contrast between the two scents. Also, I should note that I bought this one because the regular Chloe scent did not have enough rose and I find it too overpowering (I'm prone to migraines from scent) even though I do like it on other people.  This is a beautiful scent. Similar to Stella, but warmer because the lack of citrus. It's an EDT but I find the lasting power to be very good - just as good as Stella. In the dead of winter it reminds me of springtime when the magnolia trees bloom in all their glory. I just love it (so does my husband), what's more to say!
I am absolutely obsessed with this perfume! Smells romantic and special. Not your grandmothers rose perfume!

I love modern rose scented items, not your grandmas rose scented powder, and this perfume does it for me! I use one spritz and that will last me all day, I haven't had any trouble with the scent fading. I generally pair it with Ro's Argon body conditioner from a different retailer *gasp*, but they match perfectly so I'm guessing that's why my scent doesn't fade. I love this perfume and definitely recomend it if you like modern rose.

Agree with other reviewers- lasting power is lacking, but an amazing scent that I reach for when I want to say super girly. Love Chloe L'Eau too which is more aquatic than this. The roses here are young and pretty - definitely no grandma vibes here. As with the other Chloe scents, the bottle is gorgeous.

I actually purchased this perfume from another retailer, because Sephora was not carrying it yet. The scent is absolutely divine! It's my go-to everyday perfume and I cannot get enough of it. Like some other reviewers mentioned, it doesn't really smell like any other perfumes - more just like a rose scented body mist. The staying power is, unfortunately, that of a body mist as well. I am still completely in love with the perfume and intend to buy more when I run out, but wish that it was just a bit longer lasting.

I got a sample of this on a recent visit to Sephora, and it smells amazing....I can't stop smelling my wrists. It smells so rosy and fresh, like what I imagine Paris to smell like in springtime. My only complaint is the lasting power :( I really do not prefer EDTs, especially when a fragrance is a light one like this. Considering that, the price seems very steep. I still may splurge though, and just carry it around with me everywhere!

This perfume smells amazing! At first, before I smelt it, I thought for sure that the rose was going to be overpowering and strong. However, I soon realized after testing it, that it really gave that hint of freshness and the fresh smell of roses, but not just that. All the other scents mixed in with the perfume really compliment eachother in the best way possible.  The first day I wore this, one of my friends commented saying that I smelt really good. I was worried that when spritzed, it would be too strong and noticeable, but it gives a pleasant trace of aroma, where you can smell the amazing scent, but not to the point where it gives you a headache!  Really amazing perfume! I'm forever hooked into Rose de Chloe, and also wanting to try more products from the Chloe line!  AMAZING!

I wanted something light enough to wear on any occasion, but distinctive for someone to smell if they get close. This fragrance is PERFECT. I've never paid this much for perfume but I didn't regret this. Love it.

Roses de Chloe is a lovely fragrance. To my nose, it's tea rose and amber. It's not nearly as good as the original Chloe, which smells like a perfectly blended, recognizable perfume to me. My nose could mistake Roses de Chloe for a Crabtree & Evelyn body lotion, or a potpourri in a bowl on the piano. If it had just of a touch of the power in original Chloe it would be magnificent (and maybe this does come out on others' skin). I'm sure I'll buy this, because it is one of the best rose perfumes I've ever smelled. My review compares it, perhaps unfairly, to the original Chloe, which I adore. Fans of Chloe, Stella, Rosewater, Rose de Rosine and all the great new rose perfumes.
I love this fragrance because it is light and fresh. I think the rose note is spot on, doesn't smell fake or like chemicals. I've been enjoying using this regularly.

reviews.review_title: A gorgeous, girly scent- -can't get enough!
reviews.review_text: Let me first start by saying that I have a pretty sensitive nose. I find lots of popular fragrances to be cloying and headache-inducing, so I am constantly on the hunt for a fresh, clean, pretty scent that won't give me a headache or make me feel nauseous while wearing.  And this is definitely it. I first received a sample of this from another retailer, and I was surprised how much I liked it--I'm usually not a fan of rose-y scents. But this one is crisp, clean, ultra-feminine, and just SO GOOD. I immediately jumped online and ordered the largest size bottle after smelling the sample!  This perfume is light enough to wear during the day, but also appropriate to wear on date nights too. It wears well, lasts, and I've received tons of compliments on it. It's not a youthful scent (fruity), but it isn't an old scent either (spicy/musky)--if you know what I mean. It's just a really great floral perfume. If you love Diptyque's Baies candle, this scent is for you. I love this perfume so much that I've even purchased the body lotion, and I have asked my husband for a bottle of the shower gel for a Valentine's Day gift as well. He also loves the scent too, so yay.  Also, if it's any help---my previous favorite scents to wear were Burberry London, Ralph Lauren Blue, and Valentino's Valentina. I would occasionally wear Tom Ford's Violet Blonde and Calvin Klein Euphoria, but both would leave me with a headache often. Roses de Chloe beats all of these. I rarely leave reviews for product, but I can't recommend this scent enough! The best.
I love the original Chloe fragrance, I asked for a sample. It is so fresh floral smell, I love it!!! Whenever I get a little money saved I think I'll splurge on the biggest bottle they have!!!!
This perfume smells exactly like fresh-cut roses. It is a light fragrance but has great staying power. It isn't a grandma-ish rose scent but very modern and fresh!

Received a sample of this and it smells perfect! Love the soft scent of lovely fresh cut roses! Can't wait to buy this beautiful perfect rose scent! If you are looking for a scent that is mostly roses, this is the one!

I am a Chloe perfume addict. I wear the original and green one (see by chloe) religiously. I was very excited for this new one to come out. I found it way too over-powering. I had 2 sprays on my wrists, but I got 2 comments: your perfume is very strong and wow, that's some heavy perfume. Not a compliment :( It smells like roses, true to its name. However, in my opinion, it smells like a little old lady who has dementia and kept putting her perfume on again and again. I didn't think it smelled modern or chic.

reviews.review_title: smells similar to diptyque eau rose
reviews.review_text: Just got a sample card of this and it is remarkably similar to one of my favorites, diptyque eau rose, though I prefer diptyque to this one for how it wears and dries down on me. Plus diptyque has amazing packaging. Still, this one smells like roses a bit of the original Chloe with some freshness. Not bad!

it does not smell like the original chloe (2008 edition), but i think it is beautiful in its own right. it smells like roses, but as other reviewers have pointed out, it is not 'old' or 'mature' smelling. it isn't long lasting on the skin, but i find it lasts about as long as the chloe EDP, even though this is an EDT. i spray some in my hair and on my clothes, which tend to hold the scent longer :) this smell makes me feel adult and feminine; it is the kind of smell that makes you turn and look at someone when they pass you by.

i traveled to oxford in september and happened to see a bottle of this in heathrow airport: i love the original so i had to try this one. it's definitely a very rose scented perfume, but has a more delicate, modern twist to it. the original is very, very fragrant, and what i like most about this is that it's not overpowering. i do feel that it has a bit more lasting power than other reviewers are giving it credit for. i have worn this on several occasions out with my fiancu00e9 and even though i can't smell it on myself, i've gotten compliments from people around me on this fragrance. i do also layer it with some unscented lotion, which does seem to hold the fragrance longer.  should you have to work with a more expensive perfume for lasting power? probably not, but i don't mind for a scent that i truly love.

I agree with the previous reviewer that the scent does not last. I understand it's not perfume but eau de toilette so long lasting scent is not to be expected. With that said, it's a bit pricey.  The rose scent is delicate, unique and subtle. It doesn't smell like a florist shop on Valentine's Day or a grandmother (roses remind me of mine). However, on me, other notes quickly masks the rose scent. It still smells delicate and fresh, in my opinion.  It's a limited-edition fragrance so I hope Chloe will improve the scent and its lasting quality.
This is the most lovely rose scent. I'm so happy I splurged. I actually ordered this without having ever smelled it, which is a major gamble, but it worked out nicely.

This is not an old lady rose scent. It is soft and modern - although not unlike other rose fragrances available. Unfortunately wear time is very brief. I spritzed this on my wrist in the a.m and could barely detect it by lunch.
I smelled this from a staff that works at Sephora while she was putting foundation on me. the rose smells really great and natural.
